parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

parameters.name: page_no
parameters.description: Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call. If empty, the default value is 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description:
Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), and the "page_no" to start next call. This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data.

If empty, the default value is 10. The value should be between 1 and 100.

warehouse_item_id.description:
Warehouse item id; To indicate an unique item in a warehouse

one warehouse item id can match with multiple shop_item_id

For Global Item, warehouse_item_id=Global Item id
For Local Item, shop_item_id=item_id

model_id.description:
Warehouse model SKU ID

For CB global items, this is equal to the global model_id.

For local items, it differs from model_id; use shop_model_id to match the model_id

stock_level.description: -1-No need to calculate stock level；0-None；1-Low Stock & No Sellable stock; 2-Low Stock & To replenish; 3-Low Stock & Replenished; 4-Excess

ir_approval_qty.description: IR approval but no ASN generated will be included

in_transit_pending_putaway_qty.description: ASN in-transit，ASN pending putaway, Move transfer in transit and Move transfer pending putaway will be included

sellable_qty.description: Stocks that are available for sale. This includes warehouse sellable stock, move transfer & rack transfer reserved stock that available for sale, pre-order stock.This quantity may be greater than qty displayed to buyers as it includes stock reserved for upcoming promotions.

reserved_qty.description: Stocks reserved by buyer order, RTS. And also includes rack transfer reserved stock that are not available for sale

unsellable_qty.description: Stocks in the warehouse that are not available for sale. This includes damaged stocks, isolated stock due to expired/near expiring, in warehouse staging location, missing, etc.

excess_stock.description: Number of units that are above 6 days of sales coverage Days.

coverage_days.description: Days that the current sellable and pending inbound inventory are expected to last based on current selling speed.

in_whs_coverage_days.description: Days that the current sellable inventory are expected to last based on current selling speed.

parameters.name: start_time
parameters.description: Start date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Only data within the past 1 year can be queried, and the time range must not exceed 90 days.

parameters.description: End date in YYYY-MM-DD format. Only data within the past 1 year can be queried, and the time range must not exceed 90 days.

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

warning.description: Indicate waring details if hit waring. Empty if no waring happened.

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

item_status.description: Item status, could be UNLIST or NORMAL.

dimension.description: The dimension of this item.

package_length.description: The length of package for this item, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this item, the unit is CM.

package_height.description: The height of package for this item, the unit is CM.

enabled.description: Whether channel is enabled for this item.

shipping_fee.description: Shipping fee, only needed when logistics fee_type = CUSTOM_PRICE.

size_id.description: Size ID, only needed when logistic fee_type = SIZE_SELECTION.

value_id.description: Value ID. In the following cases, the value id needs to be uploaded as 0, and original_value_name is mandatory, needs to be filled in customized value. (1) AttributeInputType is TEXT_FILED; (2) AttributeInputType is COMBO_BOX or MULTIPLE_SELECT_COMBO_BOX, and the seller want to fill in a customized value.

original_value_name.description: Value name. original_value_name from product.get_attributes api. If value id=0, this field is required. If AttributeType is DATE_TYPE or TIMESTAMP_TYPE, you can upload timestamp(string type) as the original_value_name.

pre_order.description: Pre order setting of this item.

days_to_ship.description: The guaranteed days to ship orders. Please get the days_to_ship range from get_item_limit api.

condition.description: Condition of item, could be USED or NEW.

video_upload_id.description: Video upload ID returned from video uploading API. Only accept one video_upload_id.

item_dangerous.description: This field is only applicable for local sellers in Indonesia and Malaysia. Use this field to identify whether a product is a dangerous product. 0 for non-dangerous product and 1 for dangerous product. For more information, please visit the market's respective Seller Education Hub.

ncm.description:
Mercosur Common Nomenclature, it is a convention between Mercosur member countries to easily recognize goods, services and productive factors negotiated among themselves. (BR region)


NCM must have 8 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a NCM enter the value "00"

same_state_cfop.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in the same state. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)

diff_state_cfop.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in different states. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)

csosn.description: Code of Operation Status – Simples Nacional, code for company operations to identify the origin of the goods and the taxation regime of the operations.(BR region)

cest.description:
Tax Replacement Specifying Code (CEST), to separate within the same NCM products that do or do not have ICMS tax substitution. (BR region)

CEST must have 7 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a CEST enter the value "00".

invoice_option.description: Value shuold be one of NO_INVOICES VAT_MARGIN_SCHEME_INVOICES VAT_INVOICES NON_VAT_INVOICES and if value is NON_VAT_INVOICE vat_rate should be null (PL region)

vat_rate.description: Value should be one of 0% 5% 8% 23% NO_VAT_RATE (PL region)

tax_type.description:
tax_type only for TW whitelist shop. Shopee will referred Tax type when substitute sellers for issuing e-receipts to buyers. All variations share the same tax type. The meaning of value: 

0: no tax type

1: tax-able

2: tax-free

pis.description:
Only for BR shop.

PIS - Programa de Integração Social (Social Integration Program). It is a government tax to collect resources for the payment of unemployment insurance and other employee related rights.

PIS % - the tax applied to this product

cofins.description:
Only for BR shop.

COFINS – Contribuição para Financiamento da Seguridade Social (Contribution for Social Security Funding). It is a government tax to collect resources for public health system and social security.

COFINS % - the tax applied to this product

icms_cst.description:
Only for BR shop.

ICMS - Imposto sobre Circulação de Mercadorias e Serviços (Circulation of Goods and Services Tax). 

CST - Código da Situação Tributária (Tax Situation Code) is represented by a combination of 3 numbers with the purpose of demonstrating the origin of a product and determining the form of taxation that will apply to it. Therefore, each digit in the CST Table has a specific meaning: the first digit indicates the origin of the operation, the second digit represents the ICMS taxation on the operation and the third digit provides additional information about the form of taxation.

pis_cofins_cst.description:
Only for BR shop.

The CST PIS/Cofins is a code on the Electronic Invoice (NF-e) that identifies the tax situation of PIS (Programa de Integração Social) and Cofins (Contribuição para o Financiamento da Seguridade Social) in sales of goods.

federal_state_taxes.description:
Only for BR shop.

Enter the total percentage of the combination of federal, state, and municipal taxes, using up to two decimals.

ex_tipi.description:
Only for BR shop.

The EXTIPI field in the NF-e (Nota Fiscal Eletrônica) is used to indicate if there's an exception to the IPI (Imposto sobre Produtos Industrializados) tax rate for a specific product.

fci_num.description:
Only for BR shop.

The FCI Control Number is a unique identifier assigned to each import FCI (Import Content Form). It's mandatory on the corresponding NF-e (electronic invoice) to ensure compliance with Brazilian import tax regulations.

recopi_num.description:
Only for BR shop.

RECOPI NACIONAL is a Brazilian government system that facilitates the registration and management of tax-exempt operations involving paper destined for printing books, newspapers, and periodicals (known as "papel imune" in Portuguese).

additional_info.description:
Only for BR shop.

Include relevant information to display on Invoice.

group_item_info.description:
Only for BR shop.

Required if the item is a group item.

group_qtd.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter 6.

group_unit.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter UNI for the individual can.

group_unit_value.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unity), enter the value of the individual can.

original_group_price.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Enter the price of the whole package.

group_gtin_sscc.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GTIN SSCC code for the package.

group_grai_gtin_sscc.description: Example: The item is box, that contain 6 packages. Each package contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GRAI GTIN SSCC code for the Box.

seller_stock.description: seller stock（Please notice that stock(including Seller Stock and Shopee Stock) should be larger than or equal to real-time reserved stock）

size_chart.description:
ID of size chart image. If you want to remove the image size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart" empty.


Notes: Both CB shops and local shops are supported to set "size_chart".

size_chart_id.description:
ID of template size chart. If you want to remove the template size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart_id" as 0.


Notes: Only local shops are supported to set "size_chart_id", for CB shops please use "size_chart".

model_sku.description: Seller SKU of this model, model_sku length information needs to be no more than 100 characters.

seller_stock.description: seller stock（Please notice that stock(including Seller Stock and Shopee Stock) should be larger than or equal to real-time reserved stock）

dimension.description:
The dimension of this model.

If don't set the dimension of this model, will use the dimension of item by default.

package_length.description: The length of package for this model, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this model, the unit is CM.

package_height.description: The height of package for this model, the unit is CM.

pre_order.description:
Pre-order information of this model.


Notes: 

If don't set the DTS of this model, will use the DTS of the item by default.

days_to_ship.description: Days to ship. Please get the days_to_ship range from the get_item_limit API.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

warning.description: Indicate waring details if hit waring. Empty if no waring happened.

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

item_id.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

category_id.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a category.

item_name.description: Name of the item in local language.

description.description: if description_type is normal , Description information will be returned through this field，else description will be empty

item_sku.description: An item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. Item SKU can be assigned to an item in Shopee Listings.

create_time.description: Timestamp that indicates the date and time that the item was created.

update_time.description: Timestamp that indicates the last time that there was a change in value of the item, such as price/stock change.

is_mandatory.description: This is to indicate whether this attribute is mandantory.

value_id.description: Unique identifier for value of this item attribute.

original_value_name.description: Value name of this item attribute.

value_unit.description: Value unit of this item attribute.

currency.description: The three-digit code representing the currency unit used for the item in Shopee Listings.

original_price.description: The original price of the item in the listing currency.

current_price.description: The current price of the item in the listing currency. If product under a onging promotion, current_price will be the promotion price

inflated_price_of_original_price.description: The After-tax original price of the item in the listing currency.

inflated_price_of_current_price.description: The After-tax current price of the item in the listing currency.

sip_item_price.description: The price of the item in sip.If item is for CNSC primary shop, this field will not be returned

sip_item_price_source.description: source of sip' price. ( auto or manual).If item is for CNSC SIP primary shop, this field will not be returned

local_price.description: The original price multiplied by the local adjustment rate equals the local price. The local price is denominated in the local currency and is rounded to two decimal places.

local_promotion_price.description: During the promotion period, the CB price is multiplied by the local adjustment rate. Once the promotion starts, the price remains unchanged. During the promotion, the local_promotion_price= current_price, which is denominated in the local currency and retained to two decimal places.

price_info.description: If the item has models, price_info will not be returned. Please get the price of each model through the get_model_list api

weight.description:
The weight of this item, the unit is KG.

If set the weight of models under this item, will return the max weight of all models during the switching period to ensure system compatibility, please switch to call v2.product.get_model_list to get the weight of models.

dimension.description:
The dimension of this item.

If set the dimension of models under this item, will return the dimension with largest volume calculated by height*length*width during the switching period to ensure system compatibility, please switch to call v2.product.get_model_list to get the dimension of models.

package_length.description: The length of package for this item, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this item, the unit is CM.

package_height.description: The height of package for this item, the unit is CM.

enabled.description: Related to shopee.logistics.GetLogistics result.logistics.enabled only affect current item.

shipping_fee.description: Only needed when logistics fee_type = CUSTOM_PRICE.

size_id.description: If specify logistic fee_type is SIZE_SELECTION size_id is required.

is_free.description: when seller chooses this option, the shipping fee of this channel on item will be set to 0. Default value is False.

estimated_shipping_fee.description: Estimated shipping fee calculated by weight. Don't exist if channel is no-integrated.

days_to_ship.description: The days to ship. Only work for pre-orde.

min_count.description: The min count of this tier wholesale.

max_count.description: The max count of this tier wholesale.

unit_price.description: The current price of the wholesale in the listing currency.If item is in promotion, this price is useless.

inflated_price_of_unit_price.description: The After-tax Price of the wholesale show to buyer.

item_status.description: Enumerated type that defines the current status of the item. Applicable values: NORMAL, BANNED, UNLIST, SELLER_DELETE, SHOPEE_DELETE, REVIEWING.

deboost.description: If deboost is true, means that the item's search ranking is lowered.

promotion_id.description: The unique identifier of the promotion applied to the item.

has_promotion.description: Indicates whether the item is currently under any ongoing promotion.

item_dangerous.description: This field is only applicable for local sellers in Indonesia and Malaysia. Use this field to identify whether a product is a dangerous product. 0 for non-dangerous product and 1 for dangerous product. For more information, please visit the market's respective Seller Education Hub.

gtin_code.description:
gtin code for br region, will return this code only item has default model


Note: gtin_code = "00" means that this item is “Item without GTIN”

model_id.description: ID of the model.

is_fulfillment_by_shopee.description: return true if the item only has a default model and it is FBS model

kit.description: Indicate if the item is kit item.

complaint_policy.description: Complaint policy.Only returned for local PL sellers, and need_complaint_policy in request is true.

warranty_time.description: Time for a warranty claim.Value should be in one of ONE_YEAR TWO_YEARS OVER_TWO_YEARS.

exclude_entrepreneur_warranty.description: If True means "I exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneur"

ncm.description:
Mercosur Common Nomenclature, it is a convention between Mercosur member countries to easily recognize goods, services and productive factors negotiated among themselves.(BR region)


Note: ncm = "00" means that this item doesn't have a NCM.

diff_state_cfop.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in different states. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice. (BR region)

csosn.description: Code of Operation Status – Simples Nacional, code for company operations to identify the origin of the goods and the taxation regime of the operations. (BR region)

origin.description: Product source, domestic or foreig (BR region)

cest.description:
Tax Replacement Specifying Code (CEST), to separate within the same NCM products that do or do not have ICMS tax substitution. (BR region)


Note: cest = "00" means that this item doesn't have a CEST.

invoice_option.description: Value shuold be one of NO_INVOICES VAT_MARGIN_SCHEME_INVOICES VAT_INVOICES NON_VAT_INVOICES and if value is NON_VAT_INVOICE vat_rate should be null (PL region)

vat_rate.description: Value should be one of 0% 5% 8% 23% NO_VAT_RATE (PL region)

tax_type.description:
tax_type only for TW whitelist shop. Shopee will referred Tax type when substitute sellers for issuing e-receipts to buyers. All variations share the same tax type. The meaning of value: 

0: no tax type

1: tax-able

2: tax-free

pis.description:
Only for BR shop.

PIS - Programa de Integração Social (Social Integration Program). It is a government tax to collect resources for the payment of unemployment insurance and other employee related rights.

PIS % - the tax applied to this product

cofins.description:
Only for BR shop.

COFINS – Contribuição para Financiamento da Seguridade Social (Contribution for Social Security Funding). It is a government tax to collect resources for public health system and social security.

COFINS % - the tax applied to this product

icms_cst.description:
Only for BR shop.

ICMS - Imposto sobre Circulação de Mercadorias e Serviços (Circulation of Goods and Services Tax). 

CST - Código da Situação Tributária (Tax Situation Code) is represented by a combination of 3 numbers with the purpose of demonstrating the origin of a product and determining the form of taxation that will apply to it. Therefore, each digit in the CST Table has a specific meaning: the first digit indicates the origin of the operation, the second digit represents the ICMS taxation on the operation and the third digit provides additional information about the form of taxation.

pis_cofins_cst.description:
Only for BR shop.

The CST PIS/Cofins is a code on the Electronic Invoice (NF-e) that identifies the tax situation of PIS (Programa de Integração Social) and Cofins (Contribuição para o Financiamento da Seguridade Social) in sales of goods.

federal_state_taxes.description:
Only for BR shop.

Enter the total percentage of the combination of federal, state, and municipal taxes, using up to two decimals.

ex_tipi.description:
Only for BR shop.

The EXTIPI field in the NF-e (Nota Fiscal Eletrônica) is used to indicate if there's an exception to the IPI (Imposto sobre Produtos Industrializados) tax rate for a specific product.

fci_num.description:
Only for BR shop.

The FCI Control Number is a unique identifier assigned to each import FCI (Import Content Form). It's mandatory on the corresponding NF-e (electronic invoice) to ensure compliance with Brazilian import tax regulations.

recopi_num.description:
Only for BR shop.

RECOPI NACIONAL is a Brazilian government system that facilitates the registration and management of tax-exempt operations involving paper destined for printing books, newspapers, and periodicals (known as "papel imune" in Portuguese).

additional_info.description:
Only for BR shop.

Include relevant information to display on Invoice.

group_item_info.description:
Only for BR shop.

Required if the item is a group item.

group_qtd.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter 6.

group_unit.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter UNI for the individual can.

group_unit_value.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unity), enter the value of the individual can.

original_group_price.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Enter the price of the whole package.

group_gtin_sscc.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GTIN SSCC code for the package.

group_grai_gtin_sscc.description: Example: The item is box, that contain 6 packages. Each package contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GRAI GTIN SSCC code for the Box.

export_cfop.description:
7101 - for sales of self-produced goods

7102 - resale of third-party goods


a tax code used in Brazil to classify and identify the nature of goods or services transactions for tax purposes. This is used for goods export to other counties

description_info.description: New description  field. Only whitelist sellers can use it.

extended_description.description: If description_type is extended , Description information will be returned through this field.

field_type.description: Type of extended description field ：values: See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).

text.description: If field_type is text, text information will be returned through this field.

image_info.description: If field_type is image, image url will be returned through this field.

description_type.description: Type of description : values: See Data Definition- description_type (normal , extended).

total_reserved_stock.description:
Stock reserved for promotion.


Note: For SIP P Item, will return the total reserved stock for P Item and all A Items under the P Item;

if_saleable.description: To return if the stock of the location id is saleable

sellable_advance_stock.description: Refers to Advance Fulfillment stock that Seller has shipped out and is available to be used to fulfill an order.

in_transit_advance_stock.description: Refers to Advance Fulfillment stock that seller has shipped out and is still in transit and unavailable to be used to fulfill an order.

certification_info.description:
For PH product certification input
Required for some category and attribute option

image_id.description: The unique image ID of the certification proof, returned by the image upload API.

file_name.description: The name of the uploaded certification proof file.

certification_proofs.description: An array of proof documents for the certification; each element represents one proof file.

certification_list.description: Array of certification records for the product, each containing type, certificate number, permit ID, and proof documents.

post.description:
Get product certification rule

gtin_code.description:
- GTIN is an identifier for trade items, developed by the international organization GS1.
- They have 8 to 14 digits. The most common are UPC, EAN, JAN and ISBN.
- GTIN will help boost positioning in online marketing channels like Google and Facebook.
- That incorporation with GTIN will also aid in Search and Recommendation in Shopee itself allowing buyers to have higher likelihood of finding one's listing.


Note: If you want to set “Item without GTIN”, please pass the gtin_code as "00".

The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API

- Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number.

- Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or "00" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN.
- Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, "00" or be omitted entirely.

model_status.description: can be "NORMAL" or "UNAVAILABLE". Only CNSC and KRSC sellers can set the model_status. Normal models can be sold on the buyer's side, and UNAVAILABLE models cannot be sold on the buyer's side.

weight.description:
The weight of this model, the unit is KG.

If don't set the weight of this model, will use the weight of item by default.

If set the dimension of this model, them must set the weight of this model.

dimension.description:
The dimension of this model.

If don't set the dimension of this model, will use the dimension of item by default.

package_height.description: The height of package for this model, the unit is CM.

package_length.description: The length of package for this model, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this model, the unit is CM.

- Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number.

- Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or "00" todeclare that the item/model has no valid GTlN.
- Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, "00" or be omittedentirely.

item standardise tier variation
 There is at least one standardise_tier_variation and tier_variation

post.description:
This API allows you to update the tier structure of a product. Defining only color creates one tier, while color + size creates two tiers (maximum supported). Supported changes include: no tier ↔ one/two tiers, one tier ↔ two/no tier, and two tiers ↔ one/no tier. For details, see Developer Guide.  Please wait at least 5 seconds after creating an item before creating variants, as processing may be delayed.

tier_index.description: Tier index of model. Index starts from 0.

model_id.description: ID of model

weight.description:
The weight of this model, the unit is KG.

If don't set the weight of this model, will use the weight of item by default.

If set the dimension of this model, them must set the weight of this model.

dimension.description:
The dimension of this model.

If don't set the dimension of this model, will use the dimension of item by default.

package_height.description: The height of package for this model, the unit is CM.

package_length.description: The length of package for this model, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this model, the unit is CM.

tier_index.description:
Tier index of this model.


If you want to update one tier/two tier to no tier, can just pass the tier_variation and standardise_tier_variation as [], and pass the model >> tier_index as [], meanwhile pass the original_price, seller_stock, etc., to set the price and stock for the modified product with no tier structure.

original_price.description:
Original price of this model.

For CO local VAT responsible seller：Please remember the price you set in here must be VAT inclusive. If you have any doubts on how to calculate VAT for your product please refer to the Seller Education Hub（https://seller.shopee.com.co/edu/article/13565）

model_sku.description: Seller SKU of this model, model_sku length information needs to be no more than 100 characters.

location_id.description: location id, you can get the location id from v2.shop.get_warehouse_detail api, if seller don't have any warehouse, you don't need to upload this field.

seller_stock.description: new stock info（Please notice that stock(including Seller Stock and Shopee Stock) should be larger than or equal to real-time reserved stock）

gtin_code.description:
- GTIN is an identifier for trade items, developed by the international organization GS1.

- They have 8 to 14 digits. The most common are UPC, EAN, JAN and ISBN.
- GTIN will help boost positioning in online marketing channels like Google and Facebook.
- That incorporation with GTIN will also aid in Search and Recommendation in Shopee itself allowing buyers to have higher likelihood of finding one's listing.


Note: If you want to set “Item without GTIN”, please pass the gtin_code as "00".

The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API

- Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number.

- Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or "00" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN.
- Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, "00" or be omitted entirely.

weight.description:
The weight of this model, the unit is KG.

If don't set the weight of this model, will use the weight of item by default.

If set the dimension of this model, them must set the weight of this model.

dimension.description:
The dimension of this model.

If don't set the dimension of this model, will use the dimension of item by default.

package_height.description: The height of package for this model, the unit is CM.

package_length.description: The length of package for this model, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this model, the unit is CM.

pre_order.description:
Pre-order information of this model.


Notes: 

If don't set the DTS of this model, will use the DTS of the item by default.

days_to_ship.description: Days to ship. Please get the days_to_ship range from the get_dts_limit API.

model.description: Model info list, model number at most 50

standardise_tier_variation.description:
There is at least one standardise_tier_variation and tier_variation.


If you want to update one tier/two tier to no tier, can just pass the tier_variation and standardise_tier_variation as [], and pass the model >> tier_index as [], meanwhile pass the original_price, seller_stock, etc., to set the price and stock for the modified product with no tier structure.

parameters.name: compatibility_details
parameters.description:
To inform compatibility list, can be equal to Brand, Model, Year, or Version.


Pass the compatibility_details="Brand" to get all brand list;

Pass the compatibility_details="Model" and brand_id=1234 to get all model list under brand_id=1234;

Pass the compatibility_details="Year" and brand_id=1234 and model_id=2345 to get all year list under brand_id=1234 and model_id=2345;

Pass the compatibility_details="Version" and brand_id=1234 and model_id=2345 and year_id=3456 to get all version list under brand_id=1234 and model_id=2345 and year_id=3456.

original_price.description:
Original Price.

For CO local VAT responsible seller：Please remember the price you set in here must be VAT inclusive. If you have any doubts on how to calculate VAT for your product please refer to the Seller Education Hub（https://seller.shopee.com.co/edu/article/13565）

weight.description:
The weight of this model, the unit is KG.

If don't set the weight of this model, will use the weight of item by default.

If set the dimension of this model, them must set the weight of this model.

dimension.description:
The dimension of this model.

If don't set the dimension of this model, will use the dimension of item by default.

package_height.description: The height of package for this model, the unit is CM.

package_length.description: The length of package for this model, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this model, the unit is CM.

model_sku.description: Seller sku, model_sku length information needs to be no more than 100 characters.

location_id.description: location id, you can get the location id from v2.shop.get_warehouse_detail api, if seller don't have any warehouse, you don't need to upload this field.

seller_stock.description: new stock info for model（Please notice that stock(including Seller Stock and Shopee Stock) should be larger than or equal to real-time reserved stock）

gtin_code.description:
- GTIN is an identifier for trade items, developed by the international organization GS1.
- They have 8 to 14 digits. The most common are UPC, EAN, JAN and ISBN.
- GTIN will help boost positioning in online marketing channels like Google and Facebook.
- That incorporation with GTIN will also aid in Search and Recommendation in Shopee itself allowing buyers to have higher likelihood of finding one's listing.


Note: If you want to set “Item without GTIN”, please pass the gtin_code as "00".

The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API

- Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number.

- Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or "00" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN.
- Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, "00" or be omitted entirely.

package_height.description: The height of package for this model, the unit is CM.

package_length.description: The length of package for this model, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this model, the unit is CM.

pre_order.description:
Pre-order information of this model.


Notes: 

If don't set the DTS of this model, will use the DTS of the item by default.

inflated_price_of_original_price.description: Original price of item after tax.

inflated_price_of_current_price.description: Current price of item after tax.

sip_item_price.description: SIP item price. If item is from SIP primary shop, this field will be returned.

sip_item_price_source.description: SIP item price source, could be manual or auto.If item is from SIP primary shop, this field will be returned.

sip_item_price_currency.description: The currency of sip_item_price.If item is from SIP primary shop, this field will be returned.

local_price.description:
The original price multiplied by the local adjustment rate equals the local price. The local price is denominated in the local currency and is rounded to two decimal places.

<path></path>

local_promotion_price.description:
During the promotion period, the CB price is multiplied by the local adjustment rate. Once the promotion starts, the price remains unchanged. During the promotion, the local_promotion_price= current_price, which is denominated in the local currency and retained to two decimal places.

<path></path>

price_info.description:
Price info.

For SG/MY/BR/MX/PL/ES/AR seller: Sellers can set the price with two decimal place, other regions can only set the price as an integer.

model_id.description: Model ID.

promotion_id.description: Current promotion ID of this model.

has_promotion.description: Indicates whether the model is currently under any ongoing promotion.

model_sku.description: SKU of this model. the length should be under 100.

model_status.description: The model status. Should be MODEL_NORMAL or MODEL_UNAVAILABLE. MODEL_NORMAL models can be sold on the buyer's side, and MODEL_UNAVAILABLE models cannot be sold on the buyer's side.

pre_order.description: (Only whitelisted users can use)

days_to_ship.description: The days to ship.

stock_info_v2.description:
new stock info.

Please check this FAQ for more detail: https://open.shopee.com/faq?top=162&sub=166&page=1&faq=230

total_reserved_stock.description:
Stock reserved for promotion.


Note: For SIP P Item, will return the total reserved stock for P Item and all A Items under the P Item.

if_saleable.description: To return if the stock of the location id is saleable

sellable_advance_stock.description: Refers to Advance Fulfillment stock that Seller has shipped out and is available to be used to fulfill an order.

in_transit_advance_stock.description: Refers to Advance Fulfillment stock that seller has shipped out and is still in transit and unavailable to be used to fulfill an order.

gtin_code.description: (Only TW seller and BR local seller available) gtin code.

weight.description:
The weight of this model, the unit is KG.

If don't set the weight of this model, will use the weight of item by default.

dimension.description:
The dimension of this model.

If don't set the dimension of this model, will use the dimension of item by default.

package_height.description: The height of package for this model, the unit is CM.

package_length.description: The length of package for this model, the unit is CM.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

warning.description: Indicate waring details if hit waring. Empty if no waring happened.

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

description.description: Item description.

weight.description: The weight of this item, the unit is KG.

days_to_ship.description: The time it takes to ship the item.

is_free.description: Whether cover shipping fee for buyer.

dimension.description: The dimension of this item.

package_width.description: The width of package for this item, the unit is CM.

package_length.description: The length of package for this item, the unit is CM.

package_height.description: The height of package for this item, the unit is CM.

condition.description: Item condition, could be USED or NEW.

item_dangerous.description: This field is only applicable for local sellers in Indonesia and Malaysia. Use this field to identify whether a product is a dangerous product. 0 for non-dangerous product and 1 for dangerous product. For more information, please visit the market's respective Seller Education Hub.

warranty_time.description: Value should be in one of ONE_YEAR TWO_YEARS OVER_TWO_YEARS.

exclude_entrepreneur_warranty.description: If True means "I exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneur"

description_info.description: New description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it. If you use the field, please upload the description_type=extended otherwise api will return error. If you don't use this field, you don't need to upload the description_type or upload description_type=normal

extended_description.description: If description_type is extended , description information should be set by this field.

field_type.description: Type of extended description field ：values: See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).

text.description: If field_type is text， text information will be set by this field.

image_info.description: If field_type is image，image url will be set by this field.

description_type.description: Values: See Data Definition- description_type (normal , extended).

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

description.description: Description of item.

weight.description:
The weight of this item, the unit is KG.

Updating the weight of this item will overwrite the weight of all models under this item.

pre_order.description: Pre Order setting.

days_to_ship.description: Days to ship.

is_pre_order.description: Whether the item is pre order.

value_id.description: ID of attribute value. In the following cases, the value id needs to be uploaded as 0, and original_value_name is mandatory, needs to be filled in customized value. (1) AttributeInputType is TEXT_FILED; (2) AttributeInputType is COMBO_BOX or MULTIPLE_SELECT_COMBO_BOX, and the seller want to fill in a customized value.

original_value_name.description: Value name. original_value_name from produc.get_attributes api. If value id=0, this field is required. If AttributeType is DATE_TYPE or TIMESTAMP_TYPE, you can upload timestamp(string type) as the original_value_name.

value_unit.description: Unit of attribute value (quantitative attribute only).

item_status.description: Item status, could be UNLIST or NORMAL.

enabled.description: Whether the channel is enabled for this item.

is_free.description: Whether cover shipping fee for buyer.

wholesale.description:
Wholesale setting.

If you want to delete it, please pass it with blank.

dimension.description:
The dimension of this item.

Updating the dimension of this item will overwrite the dimension of all models under this item.

package_height.description: The height of package for this item, the unit is CM.

package_length.description: The length of package for this item, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this item, the unit is CM.

condition.description: Condition of item, could be NEW or USED.

video_upload_id.description:
Video upload ID returned from video uploading API.

If you want to delete it, please pass it with blank.

item_dangerous.description: This field is only applicable for local sellers in Indonesia and Malaysia. Use this field to identify whether a product is a dangerous product. 0 for non-dangerous product and 1 for dangerous product. For more information, please visit the market's respective Seller Education Hub.

ncm.description:
Mercosur Common Nomenclature, it is a convention between Mercosur member countries to easily recognize goods, services and productive factors negotiated among themselves. (BR region)


NCM must have 8 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a NCM enter the value "00"

same_state_cfop.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in the same state. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.

diff_state_cfop.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in different states. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.

csosn.description: Code of Operation Status – Simples Nacional, code for company operations to identify the origin of the goods and the taxation regime of the operations.

cest.description:
Tax Replacement Specifying Code (CEST), to separate within the same NCM products that do or do not have ICMS tax substitution. (BR region)

CEST must have 7 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a CEST enter the value "00".

invoice_option.description: Value shuold be one of NO_INVOICES VAT_MARGIN_SCHEME_INVOICES VAT_INVOICES NON_VAT_INVOICES and if value is NON_VAT_INVOICE vat_rate should be null (PL region)

vat_rate.description: Value should be one of 0% 5% 8% 23% NO_VAT_RATE (PL region)

tax_type.description:
tax_type only for TW whitelist shop. Shopee will referred Tax type when substitute sellers for issuing e-receipts to buyers. All variations share the same tax type. The meaning of value: 

0: no tax type

1: tax-able

2: tax-free

pis.description:
Only for BR shop.

PIS - Programa de Integração Social (Social Integration Program). It is a government tax to collect resources for the payment of unemployment insurance and other employee related rights.

PIS % - the tax applied to this product

cofins.description:
Only for BR shop.

COFINS – Contribuição para Financiamento da Seguridade Social (Contribution for Social Security Funding). It is a government tax to collect resources for public health system and social security.

COFINS % - the tax applied to this product

icms_cst.description:
Only for BR shop.

ICMS - Imposto sobre Circulação de Mercadorias e Serviços (Circulation of Goods and Services Tax). 

CST - Código da Situação Tributária (Tax Situation Code) is represented by a combination of 3 numbers with the purpose of demonstrating the origin of a product and determining the form of taxation that will apply to it. Therefore, each digit in the CST Table has a specific meaning: the first digit indicates the origin of the operation, the second digit represents the ICMS taxation on the operation and the third digit provides additional information about the form of taxation.

pis_cofins_cst.description:
Only for BR shop.

The CST PIS/Cofins is a code on the Electronic Invoice (NF-e) that identifies the tax situation of PIS (Programa de Integração Social) and Cofins (Contribuição para o Financiamento da Seguridade Social) in sales of goods.

federal_state_taxes.description:
Only for BR shop.

Enter the total percentage of the combination of federal, state, and municipal taxes, using up to two decimals.

ex_tipi.description:
Only for BR shop.

The EXTIPI field in the NF-e (Nota Fiscal Eletrônica) is used to indicate if there's an exception to the IPI (Imposto sobre Produtos Industrializados) tax rate for a specific product.

fci_num.description:
Only for BR shop.

The FCI Control Number is a unique identifier assigned to each import FCI (Import Content Form). It's mandatory on the corresponding NF-e (electronic invoice) to ensure compliance with Brazilian import tax regulations.

recopi_num.description:
Only for BR shop.

RECOPI NACIONAL is a Brazilian government system that facilitates the registration and management of tax-exempt operations involving paper destined for printing books, newspapers, and periodicals (known as "papel imune" in Portuguese).

additional_info.description:
Only for BR shop.

Include relevant information to display on Invoice.

group_item_info.description:
Only for BR shop.

Required if the item is a group item.

group_qtd.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter 6.

group_unit.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter UNI for the individual can.

group_unit_value.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unity), enter the value of the individual can.

original_group_price.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Enter the price of the whole package.

group_gtin_sscc.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GTIN SSCC code for the package.

group_grai_gtin_sscc.description: Example: The item is box, that contain 6 packages. Each package contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GRAI GTIN SSCC code for the Box.

export_cfop.description:
7101 - for sales of self-produced goods

7102 - resale of third-party goods

complaint_policy.description: Complaint Policy for item. Only required for local PL sellers, ignored otherwise.

warranty_time.description: Value should be in one of ONE_YEAR TWO_YEARS OVER_TWO_YEARS.

exclude_entrepreneur_warranty.description: If True means "I exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneur"

complaint_address_id.description: Address for complaint. Fetch available addresses using v2.logistics.get_address_list, and use address_id returned from it.

additional_information.description: Additional information for warranty claim. Should be less than 1000 characters.

description_info.description: New description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it. If you use the field, please upload the description_type=extended otherwise api will return error. If you don't use this field, you don't need to upload the description_type or upload description_type=normal

extended_description.description: If description_type is extended , description information should be set by this field.

field_type.description: Type of extended description field ：values: See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).

text.description: If field_type is text， text information will be set by this field.

image_info.description: If field_type is image，image url will be set by this field.

description_type.description: Values: See Data Definition- description_type (normal , extended). If you want to use extended_description or change description type ,this field must be inputed

gtin_code.description:
- GTIN is an identifier for trade items, developed by the international organization GS1.
- They have 8 to 14 digits. The most common are UPC, EAN, JAN and ISBN.
- GTIN will help boost positioning in online marketing channels like Google and Facebook.
- That incorporation with GTIN will also aid in Search and Recommendation in Shopee itself allowing buyers to have higher likelihood of finding one's listing.


Note: If you want to set “Item without GTIN”, please pass the gtin_code as "00".

The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API

- Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number.

- Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or "00" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN.
- Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, "00" or be omitted entirely.

promotion_images.description:
Promotion Image
Currently only allow one promoton image
You could set promotion image only if the product images' ratio is 3:4

model_id.description: ID of the model.

scheduled_publish_time.description:
Scheduled publish time of this item: 

1) Can only set scheduled_publish_time for item with UNLIST status

2) Can only set the time from current time +1hour to current time +90days, and the time is only allowed to be accurate to the minute

size_chart.description:
ID of size chart image. If you want to remove the image size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart" empty.


You only need to fill out either the image or template. If both are filled, only the template will be kept.


Notes: Both CB shops and local shops are supported to set "size_chart".

size_chart_id.description:
ID of template size chart. If you want to remove the template size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart_id" as 0.


You only need to fill out either the image or template. If both are filled, only the template will be kept.


Notes: Only local shops are supported to set "size_chart_id", for CB shops please use "size_chart".

certification_info.description:
For PH product certification input
Required for some category and attribute option

certification_no.description:
Certification number issued by the regulatory or certifying authority; uniquely identifies the certification.

refer to
https://seller.shopee.ph/edu/article/24236

permit_id.description:
Platform-defined permit ID used to link to a specific certification template or rule.

get from v2.product.get_product_certification_rule

certification_proofs.description: An array of proof documents for the certification; each element represents one proof file.<path></path>

image_id.description: The unique image ID of the certification proof, returned by the image upload API.

file_name.description: The name of the uploaded certification proof file.

ratio.description:
image weight/ image height

Will be optional in the future; can input 0.75 by default

certification_list.description: Array of certification records for the product, each containing type, certificate number, permit ID, and proof documents.

Get item promotion info.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is "". If data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data. The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100.

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

more.description: This is to indicate whether the comment list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of comments. But only respond 500 comments at most through OpenAPI, if there are more than 500, this field "more" also respond "true".

order_sn.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

buyer_username.description: The username of the buyer who posted the comment.

model_id.description:
Shopee's unique identifier for a model of an item. It will only return 0 now. 

Will be offline on 2024-12-27, please switch to use model_id_list.

editable.description: The editable status of the comment. The value may be one of  EXPIRED/EDITABLE/HAVE_EDIT_ONCE.

hidden.description: The comment is hidden or not.

create_time.description: The create time of the comment.

hidden.description: The comment reply is hidden or not.

create_time.description: The time the seller replied to the comment.

model_id_list.description: List of model id of the buyer's purchase corresponding to the comment.

image_url_list.description: List of image url uploaded by the buyer in the comment.

video_url_list.description: List of video url uploaded by the buyer in the comment.

item_comment_list.description: The comment data list of the items.

next_cursor.description: If more is true, you should pass the next_cursor in the next request as cursor. The value of next_cursor will be empty string when more is false.

original_price.description:
Original price for this model.

For CO local VAT responsible seller：Please remember the price you set in here must be VAT inclusive. If you have any doubts on how to calculate VAT for your product please refer to the Seller Education Hub（https://seller.shopee.com.co/edu/article/13565）

For SG/MY/BR/MX/PL/ES/AR seller: Sellers can set the price with two decimal place, other regions can only set the price as an integer.

post.description:
Update the kit basic information and kit components, only support adding kit variations and updating existing kit variation’s image, price, and model_sku, don’t support deleting existing kit variations and updating the items, main component and quantity per kit of existing kit variations.

### Potential Errors
| Error Code | Description |
|---|---|

video_upload_id.description: Video upload ID returned from video uploading API. Only accept one video_upload_id.

description.description: If description_type is normal, description information should be set by this field.

description_info.description: Rich text description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it. If you use the field, please upload the description_type=extended otherwise api will return error. If you don't use this field, you don't need to upload the description_type or upload description_type=normal

extended_description.description: If description_type is extended , Description information should be set by this field.

field_type.description: Type of extended description field. See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).

text.description: If field_type is text, text information will be set by this field.

image_info.description: If field_type is image, image will be set by this field.

description_type.description: See Data Definition- description_type (normal , extended). If you want to use extended_description, this field must be inputed.

enabled.description: Whether channel is enabled for this kit item.

shipping_fee.description: Shipping fee. Only needed when logistics fee_type = CUSTOM_PRICE.

size_id.description: Size ID. Only needed when logistic fee_type = SIZE_SELECTION.

weight.description: The weight of this kit item, the unit is KG.

dimension.description: The dimension of this kit item.

package_length.description: The length of package for this kit item, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this kit item, the unit is CM.

package_height.description: The height of package for this kit item, the unit is CM.

pre_order.description: Pre order setting.

days_to_ship.description: The guaranteed days to ship orders. Please get the days_to_ship range from get_kit_item_limit api.

model_id.description: ID of this kit model.

model_sku.description: Seller SKU of this kit model, model_sku length information needs to be no more than 100 characters.

component_item_id.description: ID of the item that composes this kit model.

component_model_id.description: ID of the model that composes this kit model.

quantity.description: The amount of the item/model that composes this kit model.

main_component.description:
Whether this item/model is the main component for this kit.

One kit item can only have one item/model as main component.

component_list.description: Please get the amount of item/model that one kit model support from get_kit_item_limit.

model_list.description: Model info list, model number at most 9.

image_id.description: ID of image. If you choose to define, you need to define an image for all options.

tier_variation_list.description:
Tier variation info list. 

Only support one tier variation, and each kit item can have from 1 to 9 kit variations.

auto_sync_dts.description: Auto sync the pre_order setting from main component or not.

quality_level.description:
Item's latest content quality level. Applicable values:
0: NONE (No quality level for item in SELLER_DELETE / SHOPEE_DELETE / BANNED status)
1: TO_BE_IMPROVED
2: QUALIFIED
3: EXCELLENT

issue_type.description:
Item's content issue. Applicable values:

1: TOO_FEW_IMAGES
2: WRONG_CATEGORY
3: TOO_FEW_ATTRIBUTES_FOR_QUALIFIED
4: LACK_OF_SIZE_CHART
5: LACK_OF_STANDARD_VARIATION
6: LACK_BRAND
7: TOO_SHORT_DESCRIPTION
8: TOO_SHORT_OR_TOO_LONG_NAME
9: WRONG_WEIGHT
10: LACK_OF_VIDEO
11: TOO_FEW_ATTRIBUTES_FOR_EXCELLENT

suggestion.description:
System suggestion for item's content issue. Applicable values:

Add at least 3 images

Adopt suggested category
Add at least 1 attributes
Add size chart
Adopt the color or size variation
Add brand info
Add at least 100 characters or 1 image for desc
Add characters for name to 25~100
Adopt suggested weight
Add video
Add at least 3 attributes

total_count.description: Total num of items match condition.

has_next_page.description: This is to indicate whether the item list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve the rest of items.

next_offset.description: If has_next_page is true, this value need set to next request.offset

offset.description: Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is empty. if data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

quality_level.description:
Item's latest content quality level. Applicable values:

1: TO_BE_IMPROVED
2: QUALIFIED
3: EXCELLENT

issue_type.description:
Item's content issue. Applicable values: 

1: TOO_FEW_IMAGES
2: WRONG_CATEGORY
3: TOO_FEW_ATTRIBUTES_FOR_QUALIFIED
4: LACK_OF_SIZE_CHART
5: LACK_OF_STANDARD_VARIATION
6: LACK_BRAND
7: TOO_SHORT_DESCRIPTION
8: TOO_SHORT_OR_TOO_LONG_NAME
9: WRONG_WEIGHT
10: LACK_OF_VIDEO
11: TOO_FEW_ATTRIBUTES_FOR_EXCELLENT


If you need to pass both quality_level and issue_type, the logic are as follows:
- When quality_level is 1, issue_type can only be 1, 2, 3, 4, 5
- When quality_level is 2, issue_type can only be 6, 7, 8, 9, 10, 11
- When quality_level is 3, issue_type can only be empty

size_chart_table.description: new size chart is a table format which include multiple columns. each column has column header (measurement) and multiple values (measurement value) of this column.

measurement.description: this is the column header which means a kind of measurement

input_type.description: there are 3 kinds of measurement type: Single Dropdown, Input Single Number, Input Range Number.

value.description: if the input_type of measurement is single input number, measurement will have one value which is returned by this field.

min_value.description: if the input_type of measurement is input range number, measurement will be a range which is returned by 2 fields: min_value and max_value.

max_value.description: if the input_type of measurement is input range number, measurement will be a range which is returned by 2 fields: min_value and max_value.

option.description: if the input_type of measurement is single dropdown, measurement will have one value which is returned by this field.

column_list.description: column list of new size chart table. it include one column (measurement) and multiple values (measurement value)

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

warning.description: Indicate waring details if hit waring. Empty if no waring happened.

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

description.description: Description of item

weight.description: The weight of this item, the unit is KG.

pre_order.description: Pre order setting

days_to_ship.description: The guaranteed days to ship orders.

is_pre_order.description: Whether this item is pre order

enabled.description: Whether this channel is enabled for this item

is_free.description: Whether cover shipping fee for buyer

dimension.description: The dimension of this item.

package_width.description: The width of package for this item, the unit is CM.

package_length.description: The length of package for this item, the unit is CM.

package_height.description: The height of package for this item, the unit is CM.

condition.description: Item condition, could be NEW or USED

item_dangerous.description: This field is only applicable for local sellers in Indonesia and Malaysia. Use this field to identify whether a product is a dangerous product. 0 for non-dangerous product and 1 for dangerous product. For more information, please visit the market's respective Seller Education Hub.

description_info.description: New description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it. If item with extended_description this field will return, otherwise do not return.

extended_description.description: If description_type is extended , description information should be set by this field.

field_type.description: Type of extended description field ：values: See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).

text.description: If field_type is text, text information will be set by this field.

image_info.description: If field_type is image, image url will be set by this field.

description_type.description: Values: See Data Definition- description_type (normal , extended).

complaint_policy.description: Complaint Policy for item. Only returned for local PL sellers.

warranty_time.description: Time for a warranty claim. Could be ONE_YEAR, TWO_YEARS, OVER_TWO_YEARS.

exclude_entrepreneur_warranty.description: If True means "I exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneur"

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

description.description: if description_type is normal , Description information should be set by this field.

weight.description: The weight of this item, the unit is KG.

item_status.description: Item status, could be UNLIST or NORMAL

dimension.description: The dimension of this item.

package_height.description: The height of package for this item, the unit is CM.

package_length.description: The length of package for this item, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this item, the unit is CM.

size_id.description: Size ID, If specify logistic fee_type is SIZE_SELECTION size_id is required.

shipping_fee.description: Shipping fee, Only needed when logistics fee_type = CUSTOM_PRICE.

enabled.description: Whether channel is enabled for this item

is_free.description: Whether cover shipping fee for buyer

value_id.description: Value ID. In the following cases, the value id needs to be uploaded as 0, and original_value_name is mandatory, needs to be filled in customized value. (1) AttributeInputType is TEXT_FILED; (2) AttributeInputType is COMBO_BOX or MULTIPLE_SELECT_COMBO_BOX, and the seller want to fill in a customized value.

original_value_name.description: Value name. original_value_name from product.get_attributes api. If value id=0, this field is required. If AttributeType is DATE_TYPE or TIMESTAMP_TYPE, you can upload timestamp(string type) as the original_value_name.

value_unit.description: Unit of attribute value (quantitative attribute only).

attribute_list.description: This field is optional(expect Indonesia) depending on the specific attribute under different categories. Should call shopee.item.GetAttributes to get attribute first. Must contain all all mandatory attribute.

image_ratio.description:
Ratio of image,
OptionalAllowed ratios :
"1:1" (default) 
"3:4"

only applicable to whitelisted seller.

pre_order.description: Pre order setting

days_to_ship.description: The guaranteed days to ship orders. Please get the days_to_ship range from get_dts_limit api

condition.description: Condition of item, could be USED or NEW

video_upload_id.description: Video upload ID returned from video uploading API. Only accept one video_upload_id.

original_brand_name.description: Original name of brand( No Brand if not brand).

item_dangerous.description: This field is only applicable for local sellers in Indonesia and Malaysia. Use this field to identify whether a product is a dangerous product. 0 for non-dangerous product and 1 for dangerous product. For more information, please visit the market's respective Seller Education Hub.

ncm.description:
Mercosur Common Nomenclature, it is a convention between Mercosur member countries to easily recognize goods, services and productive factors negotiated among themselves. (BR region)


NCM must have 8 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a NCM enter the value "00"

same_state_cfop.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in the same state. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)

diff_state_cfop.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in different states. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)

csosn.description: Code of Operation Status – Simples Nacional, code for company operations to identify the origin of the goods and the taxation regime of the operations.(BR region)

origin.description:
Product source, domestic or foreig (BR region).

|0 - National, except for those indicated in codes 3, 4, 5, and 8|
|1 - Foreign: Direct import, except for that indicated in code 6|
|2 - Foreign: Acquired in the domestic market, except for that indicated in code 7|
|3 - National: Goods or products with Import Content greater than 40% and less than or equal to 70%|
|4 - National: Produced in compliance with the basic production processes outlined in the legislations cited in the Agreements|
|5 - National: Goods or products with Import Content less than or equal to 40%|
|6 - Foreign: Direct import, without a national equivalent, listed by CAMEX and natural gas|
|7 - Foreign: Acquired in the domestic market, without a national equivalent, listed by CAMEX and natural gas|
|8 - National: Goods or products with Import Content greater than 70%|

cest.description:
Tax Replacement Specifying Code (CEST), to separate within the same NCM products that do or do not have ICMS tax substitution. (BR region)

CEST must have 7 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a CEST enter the value "00".

tax_type.description:
tax_type only for TW whitelist shop. Shopee will referred Tax type when substitute sellers for issuing e-receipts to buyers. All variations share the same tax type. The meaning of value: 

0: no tax type

1: tax-able

2: tax-free

pis.description:
Only for BR shop.

PIS - Programa de Integração Social (Social Integration Program). It is a government tax to collect resources for the payment of unemployment insurance and other employee related rights.

PIS % - the tax applied to this product

cofins.description:
Only for BR shop.

COFINS – Contribuição para Financiamento da Seguridade Social (Contribution for Social Security Funding). It is a government tax to collect resources for public health system and social security.

COFINS % - the tax applied to this product

icms_cst.description:
Only for BR shop.

ICMS - Imposto sobre Circulação de Mercadorias e Serviços (Circulation of Goods and Services Tax). 

CST - Código da Situação Tributária (Tax Situation Code) is represented by a combination of 3 numbers with the purpose of demonstrating the origin of a product and determining the form of taxation that will apply to it. Therefore, each digit in the CST Table has a specific meaning: the first digit indicates the origin of the operation, the second digit represents the ICMS taxation on the operation and the third digit provides additional information about the form of taxation.

pis_cofins_cst.description:
Only for BR shop.

The CST PIS/Cofins is a code on the Electronic Invoice (NF-e) that identifies the tax situation of PIS (Programa de Integração Social) and Cofins (Contribuição para o Financiamento da Seguridade Social) in sales of goods.

federal_state_taxes.description:
Only for BR shop.

Enter the total percentage of the combination of federal, state, and municipal taxes, using up to two decimals.

ex_tipi.description:
Only for BR shop.

The EXTIPI field in the NF-e (Nota Fiscal Eletrônica) is used to indicate if there's an exception to the IPI (Imposto sobre Produtos Industrializados) tax rate for a specific product.

fci_num.description:
Only for BR shop.

The FCI Control Number is a unique identifier assigned to each import FCI (Import Content Form). It's mandatory on the corresponding NF-e (electronic invoice) to ensure compliance with Brazilian import tax regulations.

recopi_num.description:
Only for BR shop.

RECOPI NACIONAL is a Brazilian government system that facilitates the registration and management of tax-exempt operations involving paper destined for printing books, newspapers, and periodicals (known as "papel imune" in Portuguese).

additional_info.description:
Only for BR shop.

Include relevant information to display on Invoice.

group_item_info.description:
Only for BR shop.

Required if the item is a group item.

group_qtd.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter 6.

group_unit.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter UNI for the individual can.

group_unit_value.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unity), enter the value of the individual can.

original_group_price.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Enter the price of the whole package.

group_gtin_sscc.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GTIN SSCC code for the package.

group_grai_gtin_sscc.description: Example: The item is box, that contain 6 packages. Each package contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GRAI GTIN SSCC code for the Box.

export_cfop.description:
[BR region]

7101 - for sales of self-produced goods

7102 - resale of third-party goods

complaint_policy.description: Complaint Policy for item. Only required for local PL sellers, ignored otherwise.

warranty_time.description: Value should be in one of ONE_YEAR TWO_YEARS OVER_TWO_YEARS.

exclude_entrepreneur_warranty.description: Whether to exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneurs.If True means "I exclude warranty complaints for entrepreneur"

complaint_address_id.description: Address for complaint. Fetch available addresses using v2.logistics.get_address_list, and use address_id  returned from it.

additional_information.description: Additional information for warranty claim. Should be less than 1000 characters.

description_info.description: New description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it. If you use the field, please upload the description_type=extended otherwise api will return error. If you don't use this field, you don't need to upload the description_type or upload description_type=normal

extended_description.description: If description_type is extended , Description information should be set by this field.

field_type.description: Type of extended description field ：values: See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).

text.description: If field_type is text， text information will be set by this field.

image_info.description: If field_type is image，image url will be set by this field.

description_type.description: Values: See Data Definition- description_type (normal , extended). If you want to use extended_description, this field must be inputed

seller_stock.description: seller stock（Please notice that stock(including Seller Stock and Shopee Stock) should be larger than or equal to real-time reserved stock）

gtin_code.description:
- GTIN is an identifier for trade items, developed by the international organization GS1.
- They have 8 to 14 digits. The most common are UPC, EAN, JAN and ISBN.
- GTIN will help boost positioning in online marketing channels like Google and Facebook.
- That incorporation with GTIN will also aid in Search and Recommendation in Shopee itself allowing buyers to have higher likelihood of finding one's listing.


Note: If you want to set “Item without GTIN”, please pass the gtin_code as "00".

The validation rule is based on the value return in gtin_validation_rule" field in v2.product.get_item_limit API

- Mandatory: This field is required and must contain a correctly formatted GTiN number.

- Flexible: This field is required and must contain either a correctly formatted GTlN number or "00" to declare that the item/model has no valid GTlN.
- Optional: This field is optional and can contain a correctly formatted GTiN number, "00" or be omitted entirely.

promotion_images.description:
Promotion Image
Currently only allow one promoton image
You could set promotion image only if the product images' ratio is 3:4

model_id.description: ID of the model.

scheduled_publish_time.description:
Scheduled publish time of this item: 

1) Can only set scheduled_publish_time for item with UNLIST status

2) Can only set the time from current time +1hour to current time +90days, and the time is only allowed to be accurate to the minute

size_chart.description:
ID of size chart image. If you want to remove the image size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart" empty. 


You only need to fill out either the image or template. If both are filled, only the template will be kept.


Notes: Both CB shops and local shops are supported to set "size_chart".

size_chart_id.description:
ID of template size chart. If you want to remove the template size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart_id" as 0. 


You only need to fill out either the image or template. If both are filled, only the template will be kept.


Notes: Only local shops are supported to set "size_chart_id", for CB shops please use "size_chart".

certification_info.description:
For PH product certification input
Required for some category and attribute option

file_name.description: The name of the uploaded certification proof file.

image_id.description: The unique image ID of the certification proof, returned by the image upload API.

ratio.description:
image weight/ image height

Will be optional in the future; can input 0.75 by default

certification_proofs.description: An array of proof documents for the certification; each element represents one proof file.<path></path>

certification_list.description: Array of certification records for the product, each containing type, certificate number, permit ID, and proof documents.
