post.description:
Create the kit item by selecting multiple items and setting main component and quantity per kit.

### Potential Errors
| Error Code | Description |
|---|---|
| error_data | parse data failed |
| error_data | data not exist |
| error_param | parameter invalid |
| error_param | The information you queried is not found. |
| error_param | Wrong parameters, detail: {msg}. |
| error_server | Something wrong. Please try later.	 |
| error_shop | shopid is invalid |
| error_param | request not from gateway |

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

video_upload_id.description: Video upload ID returned from video uploading API. Only accept one video_upload_id.

description.description: If description_type is normal, description information should be set by this field.

description_info.description: Rich text description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it. If you use the field, please upload the description_type=extended otherwise api will return error. If you don't use this field, you don't need to upload the description_type or upload description_type=normal

extended_description.description: If description_type is extended , Description information should be set by this field.

field_type.description: Type of extended description field. See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).

text.description: If field_type is text, text information will be set by this field.

image_info.description: If field_type is image, image will be set by this field.

description_type.description: See Data Definition- description_type (normal , extended). If you want to use extended_description, this field must be inputed.

enabled.description: Whether channel is enabled for this kit item.

shipping_fee.description: Shipping fee. Only needed when logistics fee_type = CUSTOM_PRICE.

size_id.description: Size ID. Only needed when logistic fee_type = SIZE_SELECTION.

weight.description: The weight of this kit item, the unit is KG.

dimension.description: The dimension of this kit item.

package_length.description: The length of package for this kit item, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this kit item, the unit is CM.

package_height.description: The height of package for this kit item, the unit is CM.

pre_order.description: Pre order setting.

days_to_ship.description: The guaranteed days to ship orders. Please get the days_to_ship range from get_kit_item_limit api.

model_sku.description: Seller SKU of this kit model, model_sku length information needs to be no more than 100 characters.

component_item_id.description: ID of the item that composes this kit model.

component_model_id.description: ID of the model that composes this kit model.

quantity.description: The amount of the item/model that composes this kit model.

main_component.description:
Whether this item/model is the main component for this kit.

One kit item can only have one item/model as main component.

component_list.description: Please get the amount of item/model that one kit model support from get_kit_item_limit.

model_list.description: Model info list, model number at most 9.

image_id.description: ID of image. If you choose to define, you need to define an image for all options.

tier_variation_list.description:
Tier variation info list. 

Only support one tier variation, and each kit item can have from 1 to 9 kit variations.

auto_sync_dts.description: Auto sync the pre_order setting from main component or not.

parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

warning.description: Indicate waring details if hit waring. Empty if no waring happened.

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

item_status.description: Item status, could be UNLIST or NORMAL.

dimension.description: The dimension of this item.

package_length.description: The length of package for this item, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this item, the unit is CM.

package_height.description: The height of package for this item, the unit is CM.

enabled.description: Whether channel is enabled for this item.

shipping_fee.description: Shipping fee, only needed when logistics fee_type = CUSTOM_PRICE.

size_id.description: Size ID, only needed when logistic fee_type = SIZE_SELECTION.

value_id.description: Value ID. In the following cases, the value id needs to be uploaded as 0, and original_value_name is mandatory, needs to be filled in customized value. (1) AttributeInputType is TEXT_FILED; (2) AttributeInputType is COMBO_BOX or MULTIPLE_SELECT_COMBO_BOX, and the seller want to fill in a customized value.

original_value_name.description: Value name. original_value_name from product.get_attributes api. If value id=0, this field is required. If AttributeType is DATE_TYPE or TIMESTAMP_TYPE, you can upload timestamp(string type) as the original_value_name.

pre_order.description: Pre order setting of this item.

days_to_ship.description: The guaranteed days to ship orders. Please get the days_to_ship range from get_item_limit api.

condition.description: Condition of item, could be USED or NEW.

video_upload_id.description: Video upload ID returned from video uploading API. Only accept one video_upload_id.

item_dangerous.description: This field is only applicable for local sellers in Indonesia and Malaysia. Use this field to identify whether a product is a dangerous product. 0 for non-dangerous product and 1 for dangerous product. For more information, please visit the market's respective Seller Education Hub.

ncm.description:
Mercosur Common Nomenclature, it is a convention between Mercosur member countries to easily recognize goods, services and productive factors negotiated among themselves. (BR region)


NCM must have 8 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a NCM enter the value "00"

same_state_cfop.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in the same state. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)

diff_state_cfop.description: Tax Code of Operations and Installments for orders that seller and buyer are in different states. It identifies a specific operation by category at the time of issuing the invoice.(BR region)

csosn.description: Code of Operation Status – Simples Nacional, code for company operations to identify the origin of the goods and the taxation regime of the operations.(BR region)

cest.description:
Tax Replacement Specifying Code (CEST), to separate within the same NCM products that do or do not have ICMS tax substitution. (BR region)

CEST must have 7 digits, OR, if your item doesn't have a CEST enter the value "00".

invoice_option.description: Value shuold be one of NO_INVOICES VAT_MARGIN_SCHEME_INVOICES VAT_INVOICES NON_VAT_INVOICES and if value is NON_VAT_INVOICE vat_rate should be null (PL region)

vat_rate.description: Value should be one of 0% 5% 8% 23% NO_VAT_RATE (PL region)

tax_type.description:
tax_type only for TW whitelist shop. Shopee will referred Tax type when substitute sellers for issuing e-receipts to buyers. All variations share the same tax type. The meaning of value: 

0: no tax type

1: tax-able

2: tax-free

pis.description:
Only for BR shop.

PIS - Programa de Integração Social (Social Integration Program). It is a government tax to collect resources for the payment of unemployment insurance and other employee related rights.

PIS % - the tax applied to this product

cofins.description:
Only for BR shop.

COFINS – Contribuição para Financiamento da Seguridade Social (Contribution for Social Security Funding). It is a government tax to collect resources for public health system and social security.

COFINS % - the tax applied to this product

icms_cst.description:
Only for BR shop.

ICMS - Imposto sobre Circulação de Mercadorias e Serviços (Circulation of Goods and Services Tax). 

CST - Código da Situação Tributária (Tax Situation Code) is represented by a combination of 3 numbers with the purpose of demonstrating the origin of a product and determining the form of taxation that will apply to it. Therefore, each digit in the CST Table has a specific meaning: the first digit indicates the origin of the operation, the second digit represents the ICMS taxation on the operation and the third digit provides additional information about the form of taxation.

pis_cofins_cst.description:
Only for BR shop.

The CST PIS/Cofins is a code on the Electronic Invoice (NF-e) that identifies the tax situation of PIS (Programa de Integração Social) and Cofins (Contribuição para o Financiamento da Seguridade Social) in sales of goods.

federal_state_taxes.description:
Only for BR shop.

Enter the total percentage of the combination of federal, state, and municipal taxes, using up to two decimals.

ex_tipi.description:
Only for BR shop.

The EXTIPI field in the NF-e (Nota Fiscal Eletrônica) is used to indicate if there's an exception to the IPI (Imposto sobre Produtos Industrializados) tax rate for a specific product.

fci_num.description:
Only for BR shop.

The FCI Control Number is a unique identifier assigned to each import FCI (Import Content Form). It's mandatory on the corresponding NF-e (electronic invoice) to ensure compliance with Brazilian import tax regulations.

recopi_num.description:
Only for BR shop.

RECOPI NACIONAL is a Brazilian government system that facilitates the registration and management of tax-exempt operations involving paper destined for printing books, newspapers, and periodicals (known as "papel imune" in Portuguese).

additional_info.description:
Only for BR shop.

Include relevant information to display on Invoice.

group_item_info.description:
Only for BR shop.

Required if the item is a group item.

group_qtd.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter 6.

group_unit.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unit), enter UNI for the individual can.

group_unit_value.description: Example: The package contains 6 soda cans. Whether you are selling a pack of 6 cans (fardo) or a single can (unity), enter the value of the individual can.

original_group_price.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Enter the price of the whole package.

group_gtin_sscc.description: Example: The item is a package that contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GTIN SSCC code for the package.

group_grai_gtin_sscc.description: Example: The item is box, that contain 6 packages. Each package contains 6 soda cans. Please inform the GRAI GTIN SSCC code for the Box.

seller_stock.description: seller stock（Please notice that stock(including Seller Stock and Shopee Stock) should be larger than or equal to real-time reserved stock）

size_chart.description:
ID of size chart image. If you want to remove the image size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart" empty.


Notes: Both CB shops and local shops are supported to set "size_chart".

size_chart_id.description:
ID of template size chart. If you want to remove the template size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart_id" as 0.


Notes: Only local shops are supported to set "size_chart_id", for CB shops please use "size_chart".

model_sku.description: Seller SKU of this model, model_sku length information needs to be no more than 100 characters.

seller_stock.description: seller stock（Please notice that stock(including Seller Stock and Shopee Stock) should be larger than or equal to real-time reserved stock）

dimension.description:
The dimension of this model.

If don't set the dimension of this model, will use the dimension of item by default.

package_length.description: The length of package for this model, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this model, the unit is CM.

package_height.description: The height of package for this model, the unit is CM.

pre_order.description:
Pre-order information of this model.


Notes: 

If don't set the DTS of this model, will use the DTS of the item by default.

days_to_ship.description: Days to ship. Please get the days_to_ship range from the get_item_limit API.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

parameters.name: page_no
parameters.description:
Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call. 


Default is 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description:
Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), and the "page_no" to start next call. This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data. 


The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100. Default is 10.

latest_point_num.description:

If seller raised appeal for this penalty point record and the appeal has been approved and Shopee adjusted the penalty point, then the original_point_num returns the penalty point before the adjustment, and latest_point_num returns the penalty point after the adjustment.

If seller raised appeal for this penalty point record and the appeal has been approved and Shopee adjusted the penalty point, then the original_point_num returns the penalty point before the adjustment, and latest_point_num returns the penalty point after the adjustment.

fulfillment_failed.description: The number of metrics that did not meet target under Fulfillment Performance type.

listing_failed.description: The number of metrics that did not meet target under Listing Performance type.

custom_service_failed.description: The number of metrics that did not meet target under Customer Service Performance type.

metric_type.description:
Type of metric: 

Fulfillment Performance = 1

Listing Performance = 2

Customer Service Performance = 3

metric_id.description:
ID of metric.

If metric_id < 0, it means that this is not a real metric, but a group of metrics.


Non-Responded Chats = -1

Late Shipment Rate (All Channels) = 1

Non-Fulfilment Rate (All Channels) = 3

Preparation Time = 4

Chat Response Rate = 11

Pre-order Listing % = 12

Days of Pre-order Listing Violation = 15

Response Time = 21

Shop Rating = 22

No. of Non-Responded Chats = 23

Fast Handover Rate = 25

On-time Pickup Failure Rate = 27

On-time Pickup Failure Rate Violation Value = 28

Average Response Time = 29

Cancellation Rate (All Channels) = 42

Return-refund Rate (All Channels) = 43

Severe Listing Violations = 52

Other Listing Violations = 53

Prohibited Listings = 54

Counterfeit/IP infringement = 55

Spam Listings = 56

Late Shipment Rate (NDD) = 85

Non-fulfilment Rate (NDD) = 88

Cancellation Rate (NDD) = 91

Return-refund Rate (NDD) = 92

Customer Satisfaction = 95

% SDD Listings = 96

% NDD Listings = 97

Fast Handover Rate - SLS = 2001

Fast Handover Rate - FBS = 2002

Fast Handover Rate - 3PF = 2003

Poor Quality Products = 2011

current_period.description: The performance of the metric at current period.

last_period.description: The performance of the metric at last period.

exemption_end_date.description:
(Only for whitelist TW sellers) The exemption_end_date value will not be empty if ALL conditions are met: 

- The shop is in the "POL Shop Whitelist"

- Within the "Exemption Period"

- The metric_id is 12 (Pre-order Listing %) or 15 (Days of Pre-order Listing Violation)

parameters.name: metric_id
parameters.description:
ID of metric. Supported values: 

1: Late Shipment Rate (All Channels)

3: Non-Fulfilment Rate (All Channels)

4: Preparation Time

12: Pre-order Listing %

15: Days of Pre-order Listing Violation

25: Fast Handover Rate

28: On-time Pickup Failure Rate Violation Value

42: Cancellation Rate (All Channels)

43: Return-refund Rate (All Channels)

52: Severe Listing Violations

53: Other Listing Violations

85: Late Shipment Rate (NDD)

88: Non-fulfilment Rate (NDD

91: Cancellation Rate (NDD)

92: Return-refund Rate (NDD)

96: % SDD Listings

97: % NDD Listings

2001: Fast Handover Rate - SLS

2002: Fast Handover Rate - FBS

2003: Fast Handover Rate - 3PF

parameters.name: page_no
parameters.description:
Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call. 


Default is 1.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description:
Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call), and the "page_no" to start next call. This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data. 


The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100. Default is 10.

punishment_type.description:

103: Listings not displayed in category browsing
104: Listings not displayed in search
105: Unable to create new listings

1111: Listing Limit POL

1112: Listing Limit is reduced

order_limit.description:
Return the specific percentage of order limit when punishment_type is: 

2008: Order Limit


Daily Order Limit = X % * L28D ADO (Average Daily Order of this Shop in Past 28 Days)

size_chart_table.description: new size chart is a table format which include multiple columns. each column has column header (measurement) and multiple values (measurement value) of this column.

measurement.description: this is the column header which means a kind of measurement

input_type.description: there are 3 kinds of measurement type: Single Dropdown, Input Single Number, Input Range Number.

value.description: if the input_type of measurement is single input number, measurement will have one value which is returned by this field.

min_value.description: if the input_type of measurement is input range number, measurement will be a range which is returned by 2 fields: min_value and max_value.

max_value.description: if the input_type of measurement is input range number, measurement will be a range which is returned by 2 fields: min_value and max_value.

option.description: if the input_type of measurement is single dropdown, measurement will have one value which is returned by this field.

column_list.description: column list of new size chart table. it include one column (measurement) and multiple values (measurement value)

shop_id.description: Id of shop to publish to.

item_name.description: Name of item. If you upload this field, we will take your value, so you should pass the value in the local language, if you don't upload this field, Shopee will automatically translate your global product name into the local language.

description.description: Description of item. If you upload this field, we will take your value, so you should pass the value in the local language, if you don't upload this field, Shopee will automatically translate your global product description into the local language.

original_price.description:
Original price of item.

For SG/MY/BR/MX/PL/ES/AR seller: Sellers can set the price with two decimal place, other regions can only set the price as an integer. If you upload this field, we will take your value, so you should pass the value in local currency, if you don't upload this field, Shopee will automatically calculate the price.

Original price of model. If you upload this field, we will take your value, so you should pass the value in local currency, if you don't upload this field, Shopee will automatically calculate the price.

model_status.description: can be "NORMAL" or "UNAVAILABLE". Normal models can be sold on the buyer's side, and UNAVAILABLE models cannot be sold on the buyer's side. If you do not upload this field, the model status will be considered as "NORMAL".

size_chart.description: Size chart of item. Only support image_id for now

enabled.description: If this logistic channel is enabled.

is_free.description: If this logistic channel is free.

pre_order.description: Preorder information of item.

days_to_ship.description: Days to ship, it's mandatory if is_pre_order is true.

description_info.description: New description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it. If you use the field, please upload the description_type=extended otherwise api will return error. If you don't use this field, you don't need to upload the description_type or upload description_type=normal. If you upload this field, we will take your value, so you should pass the value in the local language, if you don't upload this field, Shopee will automatically translate your global product description into the local language.

extended_description.description: If description_type is extended , Description information should be set by this field.

field_type.description: Type of extended description field ：values: See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).

text.description: If field_type is text， text information will be set by this field.

image_info.description: If field_type is image，image url will be set by this field.

global_model_sku.description: Sku of global model. model_sku length information needs to be no more than 100 characters.

tier_index.description:
Tier index of global model. Index starts from 0.


If you want to update one tier/two tier to no tier, can just pass the tier_variation and standardise_tier_variation as [], and pass the global_model >> tier_index as [], meanwhile pass the original_price, seller_stock, etc., to set the price and stock for the modified product with no tier structure.

weight.description:
The weight of this global model, the unit is KG.

If don't set the weight of this global model, will use the weight of global item by default.

If set the dimension of this global model, them must set the weight of this global model.

dimension.description:
The dimension of this global model.

If don't set the dimension of this global model, will use the dimension of global item by default.

package_height.description: The height of package for this global model, the unit is CM.

package_length.description: The length of package for this global model, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this global model, the unit is CM.

pre_order.description:

Notes: 

If don't set the DTS of this global model, will use the DTS of the global item by default.

days_to_ship.description: Days to ship. Please get the days_to_ship range from the get_dts_limit API.

global_model.description: Model info list, model number at most 50

standardise_tier_variation.description:
There is at least one standardise_tier_variation and tier_variation.


If you want to update one tier/two tier to no tier, can just pass the tier_variation and standardise_tier_variation as [], and pass the global_model >> tier_index as [], meanwhile pass the original_price, seller_stock, etc., to set the price and stock for the modified product with no tier structure.

value_id.description: ID of attribute value. In the following cases, the value id needs to be uploaded as 0, and original_value_name is mandatory, needs to be filled in customized value. (1) AttributeInputType is TEXT_FILED; (2) AttributeInputType is COMBO_BOX or MULTIPLE_SELECT_COMBO_BOX, and the seller want to fill in a customized value.

original_value_name.description: Name of attribute value. original_value_name from global_product.get_attributes api. If value id=0, this field is required. If AttributeType is DATE_TYPE or TIMESTAMP_TYPE, you can upload timestamp(string type) as the original_value_name.

value_unit.description: Unit of attribute value.(quantitative attribute only)

description_info.description: New description field. New description field. Only whitelist sellers can use it. If you use the field, please upload the description_type=extended otherwise api will return error. If you don't use this field, you don't need to upload the description_type or upload description_type=normal

extended_description.description: If description_type is extended , Description information should be set by this field.

field_type.description: Type of extended description field ：values: See Data Definition- description_field_type (text , image).

text.description: If field_type is text, text information will be set by this field.

image_info.description: If field_type is image, image url will be set by this field.

description_type.description: Values: See Data Definition- description_type (normal , extended). If you want to use extended_description or change description type ,this field must be inputed

size_chart.description:
ID of size chart image. If you want to remove the image size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart" empty. 

You only need to fill out either the image or template. If both are filled, only the template will be kept.

Notes: Both CB shops and local shops are supported to set "size_chart".

size_chart_id.description:
ID of template size chart. If you want to remove the template size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart_id" as 0. 

You only need to fill out either the image or template. If both are filled, only the template will be kept.

Notes: Both local shops and CB shops are supported to set "size_chart_id" now and seller need set the size_chart template in CBSC in advance

currency.description: The three-digit code representing the currency unit used for the item in Shopee Listings.

original_price.description: The original price of the item in the listing currency.

sip_item_price_source.description: source of sip' price. ( auto or manual).

price_info.description: If the item has models, price_info will not be returned. Please get the price of each model through the get_global_model_list api.

weight.description:
The weight of this global item, the unit is KG.

If set the weight of global models under this item, will return the max weight of all global models during the switching period to ensure system compatibility, please switch to call v2.global_product.get_global_model_list to get the weight of models.

dimension.description:
The dimension of this global item.

If set the dimension of global models under this global item, will return the dimension with largest volume calculated by height*length*width during the switching period to ensure system compatibility, please switch to call v2.global_product.get_global_model_list to get the dimension of models.

package_length.description: The length of package for this global item, the unit is CM.

package_width.description: The width of package for this global item, the unit is CM.

package_height.description: The height of package for this global item, the unit is CM.

pre_order.description: If set the DTS of global models under this item, will return the max DTS of all global models during the switching period to ensure system compatibility, please switch to call v2.global_product.get_global_model_list to get the DTS of models.

days_to_ship.description: Days to ship.

category_id.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a category.

value_id.description: Unique identifier for value of this item attribute.

original_value_name.description: Value name of this item attribute.

value_unit.description: Value unit of this item attribute.

size_chart.description:
ID of size chart image. If you want to remove the image size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart" empty. 


You only need to fill out either the image or template. If both are filled, only the template will be kept.


Notes: Both CB shops and local shops are supported to set "size_chart".

size_chart_id.description:
ID of template size chart. If you want to remove the template size chart of the item, please pass the "size_chart_id" as 0. 


You only need to fill out either the image or template. If both are filled, only the template will be kept.


Notes: Both local shops and CB shops are supported to set "size_chart_id" now and seller need set the size_chart template in CBSC in advance

merchant_id.description: The merchant_id for identifying the main account that granted authorization to your App. Only the shop_id or merchant_id can be selected as the input parameter, and they must be refreshed separately.

expire_time.description: Use this field to indicate the expiration date for shop authorization.

merchant_id.description: Shopee’s unique identifier for a merchant. If the shop won't under any merchant, then the value will be null.

shop_fulfillment_flag.description:
Use this field to indicate the fulfillment type of current shop, the applicable values: 


- Pure - FBS Shop: Single mode, refer to Local/CB shops which only have Shopee official warehouse stock, orders are fulfilled by Shopee from Shopee official warehouse; 


- Pure - 3PF Shop: Single mode, refer to CB shops which only have local seller warehouse stock, orders are fulfilled by seller from local seller warehouse via local logistics channels; 


- PFF - FBS Shop: 

1) Hybird mode, refer to Local shops which have both Shopee official warehouse stock and local seller warehouse stock, orders can be fulfilled by Shopee from Shopee official warehouse and can also fulfilled by seller from local seller warehouse via local logistics channels; 

2) Hybrid mode, refer to CB shops which have both Shopee official warehouse stock and CB seller warehouse stock, orders can be fulfilled by Shopee from Shopee official warehouse and can also fulfilled by seller from CB seller warehouse via CB logistics channels; 


- PFF - 3PF Shop: Hybrid mode, refer to CB shops which have both local seller warehouse stock and CB seller warehouse stock, orders can be fulfilled by seller from local seller warehouse via local logistics channels and can also fulfilled by seller from CB seller warehouse via CB logistics channels; 


- LFF Hybrid Shop: Hybrid mode, refer to CB shops which have 3 types of stock: FBS stock (Shopee official warehouse stock), 3PF stock (CB seller own stock in the local market) and CB SLS stock (CB seller own stock in CN/HK/KR);


- Others


- Unknown: Returned when obtaining shop_fulfillment_flag information fails

is_main_shop.description: Identifies if the current shop is a Local Shop linked to Cross Border Direct Shop.

is_direct_shop.description: Identifies if the current shop is a Cross Border Direct Shop.

linked_main_shop_id.description: Returns the Shop ID of the Local Shop linked to the Cross Border Direct Shop.

direct_shop_id.description: Shop ID of the Cross Border Direct Shop.

direct_shop_region.description: Shop Region of the Cross Border Direct Shop.

linked_direct_shop_list.description: Returns the list of Cross Border Direct Shops linked to the Local Shop.

is_one_awb.description:
Use this filed to indicate if the shop is in 1-AWB whitelist. 


If is_one_awb return true, please use new AWB size (10cm x 15cm thermal paper) to print AWB. For more details, please refer to: https://open.shopee.com/announcements/1138?category=3&is_top=false

is_mart_shop.description: Indicates whether the current shop is a Mart Shop.

is_outlet_shop.description: Indicates whether the current shop is an Outlet Shop.

mart_shop_id.description: (Only returned when requesting an Outlet Shop) Refers to the Mart Shop ID this Outlet belongs to.

outlet_shop_info_list.description: (Only returned when requesting a Mart Shop) List of Outlet Shop IDs under this Mart Shop.

first_mile_tracking_number.description:
If using "pickup" or "self_deliver" as the shipment method the "first_mile_tracking_number" field should pass the value generated from v2.first_mile.generate_first_mile_tracking_number.


If using "dropoff" as the shipment method the "first_mile_tracking_number" field should pass the tracking number provide by the supplier.

shipment_method.description: The shipment method for bound orders, should be pickup, dropoff or self_deliver.

region.description:
Use this field to specify the region you want to ship parcel.

Available value: cn,kr. 

Please fill in the field according to the region of the Merchant to which the shop belongs.

logistics_channel_id.description:
The identity of first-mile logistic channel.

If you using "dropoff" or "pickup" as shipment method, please call v2.first_mile.get_channel_list to get the logsitc_channel_id then fill it.


If you using "self_deliver"as shipment method then the logistics_channel_id should be "null".

weight.description: The weight of the parcel.

parameters.name: period_type
parameters.description:
Period Type. Applicable values:
Day
Week
Month
Last7d
Last30d

Note: The start date and end date must align with the Period Type.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description:
The start_date must be:

- Any day in the past three calendar months for "Day" period type

- Sunday for "Week" period type

- The 1st day of a Month for "Month" period type

- The date that is 6 days prior to the latest data date for "Last7d" period type

- The date that is 29 days prior to the latest data date for "Last30d" period type


Note: The latest data date can be obtained by using "AmsMarker" in the v2.ams.query_ams_dashboard_update_time API.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description:
The end_date must be: 

- Equal to start_date for "Day" period type

- Saturday for "Week" period type

- The last day of a Month for "Month" period type. If the selected month is the current month, the end_date should be the latest data date

- The latest data date for "Last7d" period type

- The latest data date for "Last30d" period type


Note: 

- The end_date must be later than the start_date and earlier than the latest data date

- The latest data date can be obtained by using "AmsMarker" in the v2.ams.query_ams_dashboard_update_time API.

parameters.name: page_no
parameters.description: Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. If data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data. The limit of page_size if between 1 and 20.

parameters.name: order_type
parameters.description:
Order Type. Applicable values: 

PlacedOrder
ConfirmedOrder: 

Note: 

- Placed orders are orders (COD and non-COD) that buyers have successfully placed, including paid and unpaid orders.

- Confirmed orders are either non-COD orders that have been paid for or COD orders that have been confirmed for shipping (usually 30 mins after placing the order).

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description:
Channel. Applicable values: 
- AllChannel
- SocialMedia
- ShopeeVideo
- LiveStreaming

parameters.description: Item ID for query.

new_buyers.description: Total number of new buyers who have purchased the product through affiliate marketing.

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

parameters.name: period_type
parameters.description:
Period Type. Applicable values:
Day
Week
Month
Last7d
Last30d

Note: The start date and end date must align with the Period Type.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description:
The start_date must be:

- Any day in the past three calendar months for "Day" period type

- Sunday for "Week" period type

- The 1st day of a Month for "Month" period type

- The date that is 6 days prior to the latest data date for "Last7d" period type

- The date that is 29 days prior to the latest data date for "Last30d" period type


Note: The latest data date can be obtained by using "AmsMarker" in the v2.ams.query_ams_dashboard_update_time API.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description:
The end_date must be: 

- Equal to start_date for "Day" period type

- Saturday for "Week" period type

- The last day of a Month for "Month" period type. If the selected month is the current month, the end_date should be the latest data date

- The latest data date for "Last7d" period type

- The latest data date for "Last30d" period type


Note: 

- The end_date must be later than the start_date and earlier than the latest data date

- The latest data date can be obtained by using "AmsMarker" in the v2.ams.query_ams_dashboard_update_time API.

parameters.name: order_type
parameters.description:
Order Type. Applicable values: 

PlacedOrder
ConfirmedOrder: 

Note: 

- Placed orders are orders (COD and non-COD) that buyers have successfully placed, including paid and unpaid orders.

- Confirmed orders are either non-COD orders that have been paid for or COD orders that have been confirmed for shipping (usually 30 mins after placing the order).

parameters.name: channel
parameters.description:
Channel. Applicable values: 
- AllChannel
- SocialMedia
- ShopeeVideo
- LiveStreaming

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

parameters.name: period_type
parameters.description:
Period Type. Applicable values:
Day
Week
Month
Last7d
Last30d

Note: The start date and end date must align with the Period Type.

parameters.name: start_date
parameters.description:
The start_date must be:

- Any day in the past three calendar months for "Day" period type

- Sunday for "Week" period type

- The 1st day of a Month for "Month" period type

- The date that is 6 days prior to the latest data date for "Last7d" period type

- The date that is 29 days prior to the latest data date for "Last30d" period type


Note: The latest data date can be obtained by using "AmsCampaignAnalyticsMarker" in the v2.ams.query_ams_dashboard_update_time API.

parameters.name: end_date
parameters.description:
The end_date must be: 

- Equal to start_date for "Day" period type

- Saturday for "Week" period type

- The last day of a Month for "Month" period type. If the selected month is the current month, the end_date should be the latest data date

- The latest data date for "Last7d" period type

- The latest data date for "Last30d" period type


Note: 

- The end_date must be later than the start_date and earlier than the latest data date

- The latest data date can be obtained by using "AmsCampaignAnalyticsMarker" in the v2.ams.query_ams_dashboard_update_time API.

parameters.name: page_no
parameters.description: Specifies the page number of data to return in the current call. Starting from 1. if data is more than one page, the page_no can be some entry to start next call.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data. The limit of page_size if between 1 and 20.

status.description:
Task status. Applicable values:

Doing

Done

Fail


Note: Please note that task Done here refers to the completion of scanning all products in the shop, but not the successful execution of all products. Some products may fail, but due to the unpredictable huge volume of data, detailed information will not returned in the fail_reason. After the task is Done, you need to retrieve the list again by GET API and compare it with the before list to confirm the execution details

fail_reason.description:
Error message, if it is not empty, it means there is an error

Will not return the detail error for each products, you can check the products detail by using GET API, or using the batch operate API

post.description:
Update for all products in the Open Campaign. We will only return the general error that caused the whole task failure, without returning the specific error for each product in the v2.ams.get_open_campaign_batch_task_result API. If you want to get the result for each products, you can use v2.ams.batch_edit_products_open_campaign_setting by pagination manually, or check the product status by using the GET API after the task progress turn to 100%.

parameters.name: voucher_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier of a voucher used to query the voucher details.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

request_id.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking.

voucher_id.description: The unique identifier of the voucher whose details are returned.

voucher_type.description: The type of the voucher. The available values are: 1: shop voucher, 2: product voucher.

reward_type.description: The reward type of the voucher. The available values are: 1: fix_amount voucher, 2: discount_percentage voucher, 3: coin_cashback voucher.

usage_quantity.description: The number of times for this particular voucher could be used.

current_usage.description: Up till now, how many times has this particular voucher already been used.

start_time.description: The timing from when the voucher is valid; so buyer is allowed to claim and to use.

end_time.description: The timing until when the voucher is still valid. Any time after this end_time, buyer is not allowed to claim or to use.

is_admin.description: If the voucher is created by Shopee or not.

voucher_purpose.description: The use case for the voucher. The available values are: 0: normal; 1: welcome, 2: referral; 3: shop_follow; 4:shop_game, 5: free_gift, 6: membership，7: Ads

display_channel_list.description: The FE channel where the voucher will be displayed. The available values are: 1: display_all, 2: order page, 3: feed, 4: live streaming,   [] (empty - which is hidden).

min_basket_price.description: The minimum spend required for using this voucher.

percentage.description: The discount percentage is set for this particular voucher. Only when it is a discount percentage voucher or coins cashback voucher, api will return a value.

max_price.description: The max amount of discount/value a user can enjoy by using this particular voucher. Only when it is a discount percentage voucher or coins cashback voucher, api will return a value.

discount_amount.description: The discount amount set for this particular voucher. Only when it is a fix amount voucher, api will return a value.

cmt_voucher_status.description: The voucher status in CMT. The available values are: 1:review, 2: approved, 3:reject. Only when this voucher is attending CMT campaign and not being rejected, api will return a value.

item_id_list.description: The list of items which is applicable for the voucher. Only return a value when it is a product type of voucher.

display_start_time.description: The timing of when voucher is displayed on shop pages; so buyer is allowed to claim.

target_voucher.description:
The field is used to mark new user voucher/ repeat buyer voucher 

1: new user voucher 

2: repeat buyer voucher: with 1 orders

3. repeat buyer voucher: with 2 orders

usecase.description:
usecase indicates a specific business scenario that the voucher is created and used for, i.e., new buyer voucher, live voucher, follow shop voucher, etc.

shop voucher:1

product voucher:2

new buyer voucher:3

repeat buyer voucher:4

private voucher:5

live voucher:6

video voucher:7

campaign voucher:8

follow prize voucher:9

membership voucher:10

game prize voucher:11

sample voucher:12

cod_enabled.description: This is to indicate whether this logistic channel supports COD

enabled.description: Whether this logistic channel is enabled on shop level.

default_price.description: The pre-defined shipping fee for the specific size.

weight_limit.description: The weight limit for this logistic channel.

item_max_weight.description: The max weight for an item on this logistic channel.If the value is 0 or null, that means there is no limit.

item_min_weight.description: The min weight for an item on this logistic channel. If the value is 0 or null, that means there is no limit.

item_max_dimension.description: The dimension limit for this logistic channel.

dimension_sum.description: The sum of the item's dimension

item_max_volume.description: The max volume for an item on this logistic channel.If the value is 0 or null, that means there is no limit for the item weight.

item_min_volume.description: The min volume for an item on this logistic channel. If the value is 0 or null, that means there is no limit for the item weight.

logistics_description.description: For checkout channels, this field indicates its corresponding fulfillment channels.

force_enable.description: Indicates whether the logistic channel is force enabled on Shop Level. If true, sellers cannot close this channel.

mask_channel_id.description: Indicate the parent logistic channel ID. If it’s 0, it indicates the channel is a checkout(masked) channel; if it’s not 0, indicate the channel is a fulfillment channel and has a checkout channel(checkout channel’s channel_id equals this mask_channel_id) on top of it. Multiple channels may share the same mask_channel_id.

block_seller_cover_shipping_fee.description:
Indicate whether the channel is blocked to use seller cover shipping fee function.

if the channel does not allow sellers to cover shipping fee, then the block_seller_cover_shipping_fee field will return true, otherwise it will return false.

support_cross_border.description: Indicate whether this channel support cross border shipping.

seller_logistic_has_configuration.description: Indicate If seller has set the Seller logistics configuration if set will return true, otherwise it will return false or null.

seller_logistics.description: Indicate If it's a Seller logistics channel, if it's a Seller logistics channel will return true, otherwise it will return false.

preprint.description: Indicate whether this channel support pre-print AWB

logistics_status.description:
The Shopee logistics status for the booking. Applicable values.

LOGISTICS_REQUEST_CREATED:booking arranged shipment

LOGISTICS_PICKUP_DONE:booking handed over to 3PL

LOGISTICS_PICKUP_FAILED:booking cancelled by 3PL due to failed pickup or picked up but not able to proceed with delivery

LOGISTICS_DELIVERY_DONE:successfully delivered

LOGISTICS_REQUEST_CANCELED:cancelled when booking at LOGISTICS_REQUEST_CREATED

LOGISTICS_READY:booking ready for fulfilment

LOGISTICS_INVALID:cancelled when booking at LOGISTICS_READY

LOGISTICS_LOST:booking cancelled due to 3PL lost the parcel

update_time.description: The time when logistics info has been updated.

description.description: The description of booking logistics tracking info.logistics_status

response.description:
Detail informations you are querying.


Note: For parcels that support pre-shipment printing, calling this API before shipment will only return the following fields:


response

recipient_address_info

key

image

shipping_document_info

cod

cod_amount

order_weight

logistics_channel_id

shipping_carrier

pickup_code

cod.description: This value indicates whether the order was a COD (cash on delivery) order.

cod_amount.description: Use this field to indicate cod amount.

order_weight.description: Use this field to indicate order weight when calculate the shipping fee. The unit of weigh is gram.

shipping_carrier.description: The logistics service provider that the buyer selected for the order to deliver items.

service_code.description: Only work for cross-border order. This code is required at some sorting hub. Please ensure the service_code is INCLUDED on your shipping label, otherwise the parcel cannot be processed by the warehouse. If you didn't retrieve service_code after you first called this API, please try few more times within 30 minutes.

first_mile_name.description: Only work for cross-border order.The name of the carrier ships cross country or region.

last_mile_name.description: Only work for cross-border order.The name of the carrier delivers the parcels in local country or region.

goods_to_declare.description: Only work for cross-border order.This value indicates whether the order contains goods that are required to declare at customs. "T" means true and it will mark as "T" on the shipping label; "F" means false and it will mark as "P" on the shipping label. This value is accurate ONLY AFTER the order trackingNo is generated, please capture this value AFTER your retrieve the trackingNo.

lane_code.description: Only work for cross-border order. The string use for waybill printing. The format is "S - region_code and lane_number". For example, S-TH01, S-TH02

warehouse_address.description: Only work for cross-border order in some special shop. The address info of the warehouse.

warehouse_id.description: Only work for cross-border order in some special shop. The ID of the warehouse.

return_first_sort_code.description: The first-level sort code for 3PL doing RTS.

service_description.description: Use this field to indicate the order category.

return_cycle.description: Use this field to indicate the return cycle.

return_mode.description: Use this field to indicate the return mode.

order_sn.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

ec_bar_code16.description: Use this field to indicate the first barcode.

ec_bar_code9.description: Use this field to indicate the pick barcode.

deliver_router.description: Use this field to indicate the delivery router.

store_type.description: Use this field to indicate the store type.

pick_router.description: Use this field to indicate the pick router.

barcode_dc.description: The main logistic barcode of the waybill.

ec_order_number.description: Use this field to indicate the logistics order number.

first_pick_barcode.description: The first pick barcode of the waybill.

second_pick_barcode.description: The second pick barcode of the waybill.

is_cod_bool.description: Use this field to indicate the service type.

receiver_name.description: Use this field to indicate the receiver name.

rcv_store_name.description: Use this field to indicate the receiver store name.

branch_code.description: Use this field indicates destination service point code.

branch_name.description: Use this field indicates destination service point name.

last_third_digits_recipient_phone.description: Use this field indicates buyer phone number (last 3 digits).

last_third_digits_sender_phone.description: Use this field indicates seller phone number (last 3 digits).

barcode_no1.description: First barcode no. sacnned when seller drop off

barcode_no2.description: Second barcode no. sacnned when seller drop off

ok_mid_type.description: Middle type used in OK Mart SOC

ok_aisle_no.description: Aisle no. used in OK Mart SOC

ok_grid_no.description: Grid no used in OK Mart SOC

area.description: The area of the collect OK branch used for OK sorting

barcode_no4.description: First barcode no. sacnned when buyer collect

barcode_no5.description: Second barcode no. sacnned when buyer collect

tw_last_three_digits_buyer_phone.description: [Only for local TW orders] Last 3 digits of buyer's phone number, apply for channel_id: 30005, 30006, 30007,30014,30015

tw_store_name.description: [Only for TW channel_id:30005 ] Store name for 7-ELEVEN orders.

tw_store_number.description: [Only for TW channel_id:30005 ]Store number for 7-ELEVEN orders.

buyer_prefer_delivery_time.description: [Only for TW channel:30017] The time buyer prefers to receive the packages.

start_time.description: The start time of a day buyer prefer to receive the packages

end_time.description: The end time of a day buyer prefer to receive the packages.

description.description: The detailed instructions of the package delivering.

tracking_number.description: The tracking number assigned by the shipping carrier for item shipment.

shopee_tracking_number.description: First mile tracking NO. for CrossBoard BR seller can be used to self-design CB Brazil AWB.

last_mile_tracking_number.description: The last-mile tracking number. Only for Cross Board BR seller.

is_lm_dg_bool.description: Use this field to indicate order contains dangerous goods or not. dg:1 non-dg:0

preferred_delivery_option.description:
Use this field to indicate delivery address is residential or office address.

0: not configured

1: office address

2: residential address

last_third_digits_buyer_phone.description: Use this field indicates buyer phone number (last 3 digits). For non-TW local sellers

parcel_size.description: corresponding locker sizing for self-collection locker channels [only available for specific logistic channels: 148003 and 140006]

sod.description: this value indicates whether the buyer select "scan on delivery" payment channel at checkout.

buyer_cpf_id.description: Buyer's CPF number for taxation and invoice purposes. Only for Brazil order.

mutual_check.description:
only apply for ID/VN shops.

mutual_check indicates whether the parcel is eligible for Return-on-the-Spot (RoS) co-check. 


If mutual_check=1, then the parcel is RoS eligible, where drivers and buyers can co-check the parcel. Buyer can then choose to accept or reject the parcel on the spot.


If mutual_check=0, then the parcel is ineligible for RoS.

dely_fri_label.description:
Probability of Successful Friday Delivery.

The value of L(low), M(medium), H(high) represent the chances of successful delivery attempts on Friday.

dely_sat_label.description:
Probability of Successful Saturday Delivery

The value of L(low), M(medium), H(high) represent the chances of successful delivery attempts on Saturday.

dely_sun_label.description:
Probability of Successful Sunday Delivery.

The value of L(low), M(medium), H(high) represent the chances of successful delivery attempts on Sunday.

pickup_code.description: For drivers to quickly identify parcel to be picked up. Only returned for ID and TH local orders which use instant+sameday for delivery.

sorting_group.description:
[Only for TW 30029 channel] This field indicate the sorting group value of the package. Available values: 
- North
- South

unpackaged_sku_id.description: [Only for TW 30029 channel] Please refer to this number instead of tracking number for this this channel. This field will be empty for other channels.

unpackaged_sku_id_qrcode.description: [Only for TW 30029 channel] Please refer to this field to generate the QR code for the shipping document for this channel. This field will be empty for other channels.

order_sn.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

package_number.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You shouldn't fill the field with empty string when there isn't a package number.

key.description: fields to query in the recipient address, should be name, phone, full_address, town, district, city, state, region, zipcode.

h_align.description: text horizontal align, supports left, center and right.

post.description:
After arranging shipment (v2.logistics.mass_ship_order) for the integrated channel, use this api to get the tracking_number, which is a required parameter for creating shipping labels. The api response can return tracking_number empty, since this info is dependent from the 3PL, due to this it is allowed to keep calling the api within 5 minutes interval, until the tracking_number is returned.

### Potential Errors

| logistics.error_param | Duplicate package number |

| error_param | parameter invalid |

| error_param | Wrong parameters, detail: {msg}. |
| error_server | Something wrong. Please try later.	 |

post.description:
Use this api to initiate logistics including arrange pickup, dropoff or shipment for non-integrated logistic channels. Should call v2.logistics.get_mass_shipping_parameter to fetch all required params first. It's recommended to initiate logistics one hour after the orders were placed since there is one-hour window buyer can cancel any order without request to seller. The API can only batch arrange shipment for multiple packages under the same product_location_id and same logistics_channel_id.

|---|---|

| logistics.error_param | Package is not under the specified warehouse |

| error_param | Shop id: {shop_id},return store:{return_store_name} not found. |
|  logistics.package_already_shipped | This package has already been arranged shipment and you can't call this API again. |
| logistics.error_param | Package exceeds limit. |

Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

logistics_channel_id.description:
The API can only batch arrange shipment for multiple packages under the same product_location_id and same logistics_channel_id. 


Use this field to specify the logistics_channel_id for the request. If not specified, will use the logistics_channel_id corresponds to the first package_number by default.

product_location_id.description:
The API can only batch arrange shipment for multiple packages under the same product_location_id and same logistics_channel_id. 


Use this field to specify the product_location_id for the request. If not specified, will use the product_location_id corresponds to the first package_number by default.

package_number.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there is't a package number.

package_list.description: The list of packages you want to arrange shipment. limit [1, 50].

pickup.description: Required parameter ONLY if GetParameterForInit returns "pickup" or if GetLogisticsInfo returns "pickup" under "info_needed" for the same order. Developer should still include "pickup" field in the call even if "pickup" has empty value.

pickup_time_id.description:
The pickup time id. Retrieved from v2.logistics.get_mass_shipping_parameter, you can only select one from the time_slot_list.


Some logistics channels may not return any date or time for pickup time slots. In such cases, sellers can arrange shipment without selecting any time slot, and Shopee will arrange a suitable timing for these situations.

dropoff.description: Required parameter ONLY if GetParameterForInit returns "dropoff" or if GetLogisticsInfo returns "dropoff" under "info_needed" for the same order. Developer should still include "dropoff" field in the call even if "dropoff" has empty value. For logistic_id 80003 and 80004, both Regular and JOB shipping methods are supported. If you choose Regular shipping method, please use "tracking_no" to call Init API. If you choose JOB shipping method, please use "sender_real_name" to call Init API. Note that only one of "tracking_no" and "sender_real_name" can be selected.

tracking_number.description: Need input this field when "tracking_number" is returned from "info_need". Please note that this tracking number is assigned by third-party shipping carrier for item shipment.

package_number.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

tracking_number.description: Optional parameter for non-integrated channel order. The tracking number assigned by the shipping carrier for item shipment.
Optional parameter for non-integrated channel order. The tracking number assigned by the shipping carrier for item shipment.

| logistics.error_booking_order | This order is matched order with booking, don't need arrange shipment through seller side. |
| logistics.package_can_not_print | The package can not print now.  |

post.description:
Use this api to initiate logistics including arrange pickup, dropoff or shipment for non-integrated logistic channels. Should call v2.logistics.get_shipping_parameter to fetch all required param first. It's recommended to initiate logistics one hour after the orders were placed. For BR Seller Logistics channel (logistics_channel_id: 90021) and BR Instant Delivery channel (logistics_channel_id: 90026) will have order_status PROCESSED after arrange shipment.

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

order_sn.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

package_number.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there is't a package number.

pickup.description: Required parameter ONLY if get_shipping_parameter returns "pickup" under "info_needed". Developer should still include "pickup" field in the call even if "pickup" has empty value.

address_id.description: The identity of address. Retrieved from v2.logistics.get_shipping_parameter.

pickup_time_id.description:
The pickup time id. Retrieved from v2.logistics.get_shipping_parameter, you can only select one from the time_slot_list. 


Some logistics channels may not return any date or time for pickup time slots. In such cases, sellers can arrange shipment without selecting any time slot, and Shopee will arrange a suitable timing for these situations.

tracking_number.description: Need input this field when "tracking_number" is returned from "info_need". Please note that this tracking number is assigned by third-party shipping carrier for item shipment.

dropoff.description: Required parameter ONLY if get_shipping_parameter returns "dropoff" under "info_needed". Developer should still include "dropoff" field in the call even if "dropoff" has empty value. For logistic_id 80003 and 80004, both Regular and JOB shipping methods are supported. If you choose Regular shipping method, please use "tracking_no" to call Init API. If you choose JOB shipping method, please use "sender_real_name" to call Init API. Note that only one of "tracking_no" and "sender_real_name" can be selected.

tracking_number.description: Need input this field when "tracking_number" is returned from "info_need". Please note that this tracking number is assigned by third-party shipping carrier for item shipment.

slug.description: The selected 3PL partner to drop-off parcels with.

non_integrated.description: Optional parameter when get_shipping_parameter returns "non-integrated" under "info_needed".

tracking_number.description: Optional parameter for non-integrated channel order. The tracking number assigned by the shipping carrier for item shipment.

post.description:
Use this api to get the parameter "info_needed" from the response to check if the order has pickup or dropoff or no integrate options. This api will also return the addresses and pickup time id options for the pickup method. For dropoff, it can return branch id, sender real name etc, depending on the 3PL requirements. The API can only batch request the shipping parameter for multiple packages under the same product_location_id and same logistics_channel_id. 

### Potential Errors
| Error Code | Description |
|---|---|
| logistics.error_param | Duplicate package number |
| error_param | Package is not under the specified fulfilment channel |

| logistics.error_param | Package exceeds limit. |

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.<path></path><path></path>

info_needed.description: The parameters required based on each specific order to Init. Must use the fields included under info_needed to call Init. For logistic_id 80003 and 80004, both Regular and JOB shipping methods are supported. If you choose Regular shipping method, please use "tracking_no" to call Init API. If you choose JOB shipping method, please use "sender_real_name" to call Init API. Note that only one of "tracking_no" and "sender_real_name" can be selected.

dropoff.description: Could contain 'branch_id', 'sender_real_name', or 'tracking_no'. If it contains 'branch_id', choose one to Init. If it contains 'sender_real_name' or 'tracking_no', should manually input these values in Init API. If it has empty value, developer should still include "dropoff" field in Init API.

pickup.description: Could contain 'address_id' and 'pickup_time_id'. Choose one address_id and its corresponding pickup_time_id to Init. If it has empty value, developer should still include "pickup" field in Init API. It could contains "tracking_number" returned from "info_need"for some channels, please also add it when init.

non_integrated.description: Could contain 'tracking_no'. If it contains 'tracking_no', should manually input these values in Init API. If it has empty value, developer should still include "non-integrated" field in Init API.

address_flag.description: The flag of shop address, applicable values: default_address, pickup_address, return_address, current_address (Multi-Warehouse sellers only)

date.description: The date of pickup time. In timestamp.

time_text.description: The text description of pickup time. Only applicable for certain channels.

flags.description:
This field will have the value “recommended” for the time slot that Shopee suggests sellers choose. 


While it is advisable for sellers to choose the recommended time slot, they can also choose other time slots that do not have the recommended flag.

time_slot_list.description:
List of pickup_time information corresponding to the address_id.


Some logistics channels may not return any date or time for pickup time slots. In such cases, sellers can arrange shipment without selecting any time slot, and Shopee will arrange a suitable timing for these situations.

address_list.description: List of available pickup address info. For Multi-Warehouse sellers, note that changing pickup address from Current may incur higher shipping fees.

package_number.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.
Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

logistics_channel_id.description:
The API can only batch request the shipping parameter for multiple packages under the same product_location_id and same logistics_channel_id. 


Use this field to specify the logistics_channel_id for the request. If not specified, will use the logistics_channel_id corresponds to the first package_number by default.

product_location_id.description:
The API can only batch request the shipping parameter for multiple packages under the same product_location_id and same logistics_channel_id. 


Use this field to specify the product_location_id for the request. If not specified, will use the product_location_id corresponds to the first package_number by default.

package_number.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You shouldn't fill the field with empty string when there isn't a package number.

package_list.description: The list of packages you want to get shipping parameters. limit [1, 50].

post.description:
This API creates a shipping document job for selected documents. The system receives requests and returns a job ID along with success and failure details.

### Potential Errors
| Error Code | Description |
|---|---|
| error_param | Wrong parameters, detail: {msg}. |
| error_data | parse data failed |
| error_data | data not exist |
| error_param | parameter invalid |
| error_param | The information you queried is not found. |
| error_param | Wrong parameters, detail: {msg}. |
| error_server | Something wrong. Please try later.	 |
| error_shop | shopid is invalid |
| error_param | request not from gateway |

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

request_id.description: The identifier of the API request for error tracking.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

job_id.description: Generated Job ID which will be used for status tracking and download the Shipping Document

success_id_list.description: List Package Id or Unpackaged Id that succeeds in generating Shipping Document

id.description: Package Id or Unpackaged Id that failed in generating Shipping Document

fail_error.description: Indicate error type if one element hit error.

fail_message.description: Indicate error details if one element hit error.

fail_list.description: List Packages or Unpackaged that failed in generating Shipping Document

shipping_document_type.description: The type of shipping document. Available values: THERMAL_UNPACKAGED_LABEL

quantity.description: Number of copies for the generated labels (maximum 600 total across all requested SKUs).

unpackaged_sku_requests.description: List of Unpackaged SKUs to generate labels for.

post.description:
Use this api to update the order status for buyer to collect the orders directly from your pharmacy. This includes indicating that order is ready for collection, and that the order has been picked up by the buyer. You should call v2.logistics.get_order_detail or v2.logistics.get_package_detail first to get the package_number of such orders.

### Potential Errors
| Error Code | Description |
|---|---|
| logistics.not_available_for_self_collection | Buyer self collection unavailable for this order |
| logistics.not_ready_for_self_collection | Parcel is not ready for collection yet |
| logistics.self_collect_outbound_failed | Prepare order for buyer collection |

package_number.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

self_collection_logistics_action.description:
Order logistics action. available values:

- ready_for_collection

- order_collected

epoc_image_list.description:
List of image_id for the proof that buyer already collected the order at the store. 

Required when self_collection_logistics_action is order_collected. Max: 3.

You can call the v2.media.upload_image to upload image and get the image_id, for this scenario, please pass the business = 1 and scene = 1.

post.description:
This API is designed to allow sellers to update their operating hours. It is essential that the values provided in this API align with the restrictions retrieved from the v2.logistics.get_operating_hour_restrictions API to ensure compliance with platform requirements. This API uses overwriting updates, when updating pickup operating hours, still need to include all parts even those not needing changes.

### Potential Errors
| Error Code | Description |
|---|---|
| error_permission | Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: This shop isn't eligible to set up Instant Operating Hours. |
| error_permission | Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: This shop isn't eligible to set up Regular Operating Hours. |
| error_permission | Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: This shop isn't eligible to set up Special Operating Hours. |
| error_param | All modifications to the operating hours were unsuccessful. Please check the result_list and try again. |
| error_data | parse data failed |
| error_data | data not exist |
| error_param | parameter invalid |
| error_param | The information you queried is not found. |
| error_param | Wrong parameters, detail: {msg}. |
| error_server | Something wrong. Please try later.	 |
| error_shop | shopid is invalid |
| error_param | request not from gateway |

post.description:
Use this api to batch initiate logistics including arrange pickup, dropoff or shipment for non-integrated logistic channels. Should call v2.logistics.get_shipping_parameter to fetch all required param first. It's recommended to initiate logistics one hour after the orders were placed since there is one-hour window buyer can cancel any order without request to seller.Only channel 90003 - Padrão in Brazil has the permission of this API.



### Potential Errors
| Error Code | Description |
|---|---|
| logistics.error_param | The order is being allocated, please wait until the allocate is completed. |
| common.batch_api_all_failed | Failed, please check result_list for more details. |

| logistics.package_not_exist | The package is not exist. |
| logistics.error_param | Buyer's delivery address is not serviceable. Please contact customer service. |

| logistics.ship_order_invalid_job_param | Parameter sender_real_name or tracking_number is required. |
| error_param | Parameter sender_real_name is invalid.			 |

| logistics.ship_order_pff_init | You can not ship warehouse order. |

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

order_sn.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

package_number.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there is't a package number.

warning.description: Indicate warning message you should take care.

order_sn.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

package_number.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

fail_error.description: Indicate error type if one element hit error.

fail_message.description: Indicate error details if one element hit error.

order_sn.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order. Limit 150.

package_number.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order. You should't fill the field with empty string when there is't a package number.

pickup.description: Required parameter ONLY if GetParameterForInit returns "pickup" or if GetLogisticsInfo returns "pickup" under "info_needed" for the same order. Developer should still include "pickup" field in the call even if "pickup" has empty value.

address_id.description: The identity of address. Retrieved from shopee.logistics.GetAddress.

pickup_time_id.description: The pickup time id. Retrieved from shopee.logistics.GetTimeSlot.

tracking_number.description: Need input this field when "tracking_number" is returned from "info_need". Please note that this tracking number is assigned by third-party shipping carrier for item shipment.

dropoff.description: Required parameter ONLY if GetParameterForInit returns "dropoff" or if GetLogisticsInfo returns "dropoff" under "info_needed" for the same order. Developer should still include "dropoff" field in the call even if "dropoff" has empty value. For logistic_id 80003 and 80004, both Regular and JOB shipping methods are supported. If you choose Regular shipping method, please use "tracking_no" to call Init API. If you choose JOB shipping method, please use "sender_real_name" to call Init API. Note that only one of "tracking_no" and "sender_real_name" can be selected.

branch_id.description: The identity of branch. Retrieved from shopee.logistics.GetBranch branch.

tracking_number.description: Need input this field when "tracking_number" is returned from "info_need". Please note that this tracking number is assigned by third-party shipping carrier for item shipment.

non_integrated.description: Optional parameter when GetParameterForInit returns "non-integrated" or GetLogisticsInfo returns "non-integrated" under "info_needed".

tracking_number.description: Optional parameter for non-integrated channel order. The tracking number assigned by the shipping carrier for item shipment.
