order_sn.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

return_order_sn_list.description: The list of the serial number of return.

escrow_amount.description:
The total amount that the seller is expected to receive for the order and will change before order is completed. 

For non cb sip affiliate shop (new formula): 

escrow_amount= original_cost_of_goods_sold-original_shopee_discount+seller_return_refund+ shopee_discount- voucher_from_seller- seller_coin_cash_back+ buyer_paid_shipping_fee- actual_shipping_fee+ shopee_shipping_rebate+ shipping_fee_discount_from_3pl- reverse_shipping_fee+ rsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount- final_return_to_seller_shipping_fee- seller_transaction_fee- service_fee- commission_fee- campaign_fee- shipping_seller_protection_fee_amount- delivery_seller_protection_fee_premium_amount-final_escrow_product_gst- order_ams_commission_fee- escrow_tax-sales_tax_on_lvg-reverse_shipping_fee_sst-shipping_fee_sst-withholding_tax-overseas_return_service_fee-vat_on_imported_goods - withholding_vat_tax - withholding_pit_tax - seller_order_processing_fee + buyer_paid_packaging_fee - trade_in_bonus_by_seller - fbs_fee


For cb sip affiliate shop: escrow_amount=escrow_amount_pri * exchange_rate


note: Return refund amount = if adjustable RR, will equal to drc_adjustable_refund

buyer_total_amount.description: The snapshot value of total amount that paid by buyer at checkout moment.

order_original_price.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.

original_price.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.

order_discounted_price.description: The total discounted price for this order. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

order_selling_price.description: This field value = sum of item unit price.selling price comes from the sum up of each item's unit price. For non-bundle deal case, this value will be same like order_original_price; For bundle deal case, this value will be price of sum of item price before bundle deal promo but after item promo.It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

order_seller_discount.description: The total discount seller provided for this order. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

seller_discount.description: Final sum of each item seller discount of a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

shopee_discount.description: Final sum of each item Shopee discount of a specific order. This amount will rebate to seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate order. )

voucher_from_seller.description: Final value of voucher provided by Seller for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

voucher_from_shopee.description: Final value of voucher provided by Shopee for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

coins.description: This value indicates the total amount offset when the buyer consumed Shopee Coins upon checkout. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

buyer_paid_shipping_fee.description: The shipping fee paid by buyer. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

buyer_transaction_fee.description: Tansaction fee paid by buyer for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

cross_border_tax.description: Amount incurred by Buyer for purchasing items outside of home country or region. Amount may change after Return Refund. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

payment_promotion.description: The amount offset via payment promotion. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

commission_fee.description:
The commission fee charged by Shopee platform if applicable. 


For cb sip affiliate shop: commission_fee=commission_fee_pri * exchange_rate

service_fee.description:
Amount charged by Shopee to seller for additional services.


For cb sip affiliate shop: service_fee=service_fee_pri * exchange_rate


For tw shop, there will be pre-order service fee included

seller_transaction_fee.description: Tansaction fee paid by seller for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

seller_lost_compensation.description: Compensation to seller in case of lost parcel. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

seller_coin_cash_back.description: Value of coins provided by Seller for purchasing with his or her store for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

escrow_tax.description: Cross-border tax imposed by the Indonesian government on sellers. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

estimated_shipping_fee.description: The estimated shipping fee is an estimation calculated by Shopee based on specific logistics courier's standard. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

final_shipping_fee.description: Final adjusted amount that seller has to bear as part of escrow. This amount could be negative or positive. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

actual_shipping_fee.description: The final shipping cost of order and it is positive. For Non-integrated logistics channel is 0. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

shipping_fee_sst.description: The Service Tax charged on Seller Paid Shipping Fee for forward shipping, based on Malaysia SST regulations for shipping fees on all orders. Definition of Seller Paid Shipping Fee is Actual Shipping Fee subtracted by sum of Shipping Fee Paid by Buyer and Shipping Rebate From Shopee. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop)

order_chargeable_weight.description: For CB shop, display weight used to calculate actual_shipping_fee for this order.

shopee_shipping_rebate.description: The platform shipping subsidy to the seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

shipping_fee_discount_from_3pl.description: The discount of shipping fee from 3PL. Currently only applicable to ID. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

seller_shipping_discount.description: The shipping discount defined by seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

seller_voucher_code.description: The list of voucher code provided by seller. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

drc_adjustable_refund.description: The adjustable refund amount from Shopee Dispute Resolution Center.

cost_of_goods_sold.description: Final amount paid by the buyer for the items in a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

original_cost_of_goods_sold.description: Amount paid by the buyer for the items in a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

original_shopee_discount.description: Sum of each item Shopee discount of a specific order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

seller_return_refund.description: Amount returned to Seller in the event of Partial Return.

item_sku.description: A item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. Item SKU can be assigned to an item in Shopee Listings.

model_id.description: ID of the model that belongs to the same item.

model_name.description: Name of the model that belongs to the same item. A seller can offer variations of the same item. For example, the seller could create a fixed-priced listing for a t-shirt design and offer the shirt in different colors and sizes. In this case, each color and size combination is a separate variation. Each variation can have a different quantity and price.

model_sku.description: A model SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller. It is only intended for the seller's use. Many sellers assign a SKU to an item of a specific type, size, and color, which are variations of one item in Shopee Listings.

original_price.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.

original_price_pri.description: The agreed settlement price of items used as settlement basis, amount is in the primary currency. (Only display for CB SIP affiliate shop.)

selling_price.description: For non-bundle deal case, this value will be same like item original_price; For bundle deal case, this value will be price of sum of item price before bundle deal promo but after item promo. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1 (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop.)

discounted_price.description: The after-discount price of the item in the listing currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1. If there is no discount, this value will be the same as that of original_price.

seller_discount.description: The discount provided by seller for this item

shopee_discount.description: The discount provided by Shopee for this item

discount_from_coin.description: The offset of this item when the buyer consumed Shopee Coins upon checkout. In case of bundle deal item, this value will return 0. Due to technical restriction, this field will return incorrect value under bundle deal case if we don’t configure it to 0.

discount_from_voucher_shopee.description: The offset of this item when the buyer use Shopee voucher.

discount_from_voucher_seller.description: The offset of this item when the buyer use seller-specific voucher.

activity_type.description: The type of the item, default is "". If the item is a bundle item the value is "bundle_deal", and if a add on deal item, the value is "add_on_deal"

activity_id.description: If bundle_deal the is id of bundle deal, if add_on_deal this is id of add on deal.

is_main_item.description: Meaning a main or sub item for add_on_deal.

quantity_purchased.description: This value indicates the number of identical items purchased at the same time by the same buyer from one listing/item.

is_b2c_shop_item.description: Indicates whether this is a B2C owned item.

ams_commission_fee.description: The amount of affiliate commission fee. Applicable for items sold via the Affiliate Program.

is_kit.description: Indicates if this item is a kit. (only for BR local seller)

mt_item_id.description: The merchant item identifier of the product within the kit (only for BR local seller)

mt_model_id.description: The merchant product model of the item within the kit. (only for BR local seller)

total_qty.description: The quantity of this specific component within the kit. (only for BR local seller)

parent_item_price.description: The price of the item when it is listed as a standalone item. (only for BR local seller)

item_price_prorated.description: The price of the item when it is listed within the kit (i.e. proportionally distributed) (only for BR local seller)

promotion_type.description:
Indicates the type of item- or package-level promotion applied to a product. Each item can be associated with at most one item promotion and one package promotion at a time.

Item Promotions:

low_price_promotion

deep_discount

platform_sale

seller_discount

flash_sale

wholesale

welcome_package_free_gift

brand_flash_sale

in_shop_flash_sale

synced_promo

platform_streaming_price

seller_streaming_price

exclusive_streamer_price

price_bidding_with_rebate

price_bidding_without_rebate

seller_advisor_price

selling_price

settlement_price

campaign_settlement_price

local_sip_settlement_price

platform_exclusive_price

seller_exclusive_price

seller_member_exclusive_sku

item_price

order_sync_price


Package Promotions:
bundle_deal
add_on_deal_main
add_on_deal_sub

promotion_id.description: Represents the unique identifier of a specific promotion applied to an item. Each promotion_id corresponds to a distinct promotion rule or campaign, defined under a particular promotion_type. The value is expressed in a numeric string format.

items.description: This object contains the detailed breakdown for all the items in this order, including regular items(non-activity) and activity items.

escrow_amount_pri.description: The total amount in the prim currency that the seller is expected to receive for the order and will change before order completed . escrow_amount_pri=original_price_pri-seller_return_refund_pri-commission_fee_pri-service_fee_pri-drc_adjustable_refund_pri.(Only display for cb sip affiliate order. )

buyer_total_amount_pri.description: The total amount that paid by buyer in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate order. )

original_price_pri.description: The original price of the item before ANY promotion/discount in the primary currency. It returns the subtotal of that specific item if quantity exceeds 1.(Only display for cb sip affiliate order. )

seller_return_refund_pri.description: Amount returned to Seller in the event of Partial Return in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

commission_fee_pri.description: The commission fee charged by Shopee platform if applicable in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

service_fee_pri.description: Amount charged by Shopee to seller for additional services in the primary currency. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

drc_adjustable_refund_pri.description: The adjustable refund amount from Shopee Dispute Resolution Center in the primary currency after proration. (Only applicable for cb sip affiliate shop.)

pri_currency.description: The currency of the country or region where the shop that real seller operates. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

aff_currency.description: The currency of the country or region where shop opened in. (Only display for cb sip affiliate shop. )

exchange_rate.description: Exchange rate from primary shop currency to affiliate shop currency.

reverse_shipping_fee.description: Shopee charges the reverse shipping fee for the returned order.The value of this field will be non-negative.

reverse_shipping_fee_sst.description: The Service Tax charged on Reverse Shipping Fee for reverse shipping, based on Malaysia SST regulations for shipping fees on all orders. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop)

final_product_protection.description: The total amount of product protection purchased during placing an order.

credit_card_promotion.description: This value indicate the offset via credit card promotion.

final_product_vat_tax.description: Value-added Tax is required for online purchases based on EU Value-added Tax regulations . (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

final_shipping_vat_tax.description: Value-added Tax for product price is required for online purchases based on EU Value-added Tax regulations. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop. )

campaign_fee.description: The campaign fee charged by Shopee platform. Only available for some local Indonesian shops.

sip_subsidy.description: The SIP subsidy amount is the difference between the item settlement price set by seller and item price actually paid by buyer. (Only available for CB SIP A Shops)

sip_subsidy_pri.description: The SIP subsidy amount is the difference between the item settlement price set by seller and item price actually paid by buyer. This value is in the primary currency. (Only available for CB SIP A Shops)

rsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount.description:
The insurance claim amount if seller opt in to insurance program. this covers Reverse shipping Fee in the case of RR. As per Jun 2024:
- For ID & MY Local: After Extension on coverage to FSF due to RR. this claim amount will consist of FSF + RSF claim.
- For PH local: This will only cover RSF claim

will be updated if there's any RR/cancellation

shipping_seller_protection_fee_amount.description: Service fee charged to seller in MY,ID,PH Local (as per Jun 2024) due to additional program purchased.

final_escrow_product_gst.description: Goods and Service Tax for product price is required for imported goods (overseas orders) based on Singapore GST regulations. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop selling in Singapore)

final_escrow_shipping_gst.description: Goods and Service Tax for shipping fee is required for imported goods (overseas orders) based on Singapore GST regulations. (Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop selling in Singapore.)

delivery_seller_protection_fee_premium_a.description: [Currently apply to ID & local orders only] An insurance premium charged to seller at the time parcel is picked up by 3PL for insurance in case of parcel lost/damaged by 3PL.

adjustment_reason.description:
Reason for adjustment. 

Possible cases could be:

- Return Refund deduction or compensation

- logistic issue deduction or compensation

- marketing fee deduction

- payment related fee

order_adjustment.description:
Order level adjustment transaction information.

If the order without adjustment, no returned of the field.

escrow_amount_after_adjustment.description: Final income seller can get from this order after deduct the order-level adjustment.

order_ams_commission_fee.description: The amount of affiliate commission fee for this order. Applicable for orders sold via the Affiliate Program.

buyer_payment_method.description: The payment method buyer used when do the order checkout.

instalment_plan.description: The instalment plan buyer chosen when do the order checkout. Only applicable when payment method support instalment.

sales_tax_on_lvg.description: Sales Tax on Low Value Goods (LVG) is required for imported goods (overseas orders) based on Malaysia SST regulations for selective orders (e.g. CB LVG orders in MY)

final_return_to_seller_shipping_fee.description: The amount of fee charged to seller (if any) for the failed delivery order.

withholding_tax.description:
Only for PH local shops.

According to regulations issued by Bureau of Internal Revenue in PH, the Withholding Tax is applied to the gross remittances sent by Shopee to online suppliers of goods and services.

overseas_return_service_fee.description: This is overseas return service fee charged to sellers who register ORS program.(Only applicable for non cb sip affiliate shop)

prorated_coins_value_offset_return_items.description: This is the prorated value from cash equivalent of coin offset due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR. If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

prorated_shopee_voucher_offset_return_it.description: This is the prorated refund value from shopee voucher discount due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR. If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

prorated_seller_voucher_offset_return_it.description: This is the prorated refund value from seller voucher discount due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR. If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

prorated_payment_channel_promo_bank_offs.description: This is the prorated value from bank payment channel promo due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR.If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

prorated_payment_channel_promo_shopee_of.description: This is the prorated value from shopee payment channel promo due to adjustable RR.This field will only be updated when there is an adjustable RR.If it's a full RR or normal order will response 0.

fsf_seller_protection_fee_claim_amount.description: The claim amount given to seller if seller opt in to shipping fee service program. this covers Forward Shipping Fee cost in the case of cancelled due to Failed delivery.

vat_on_imported_goods.description:
7% VAT is charged for imported goods entering Thailand.

8% VAT is charged for imported goods entering Vietnam

payment_channel_name.description: Name of the payment channel that buyer used in checkout.

instalment_plan.description: Tenure information. This will have value if payment channel used has tenure information, such as credit card.

withholding_vat_tax.description: By VN law, E-commerce platforms need to Withhold VAT tax applicable to all VN business household and VN individual sellers

withholding_pit_tax.description: By VN law, E-commerce platforms need to Withhold Personal Income Tax applicable to all VN business household and VN individual sellers

tax_registration_code.description: For VN Withholding Tax. This is the Tax Registration Number (TRN) from Seller Info (Business information) of the seller at the point of order creation

service_fee_info_list.description:
This displays a breakdown of the service fees. 


Amount charged by Shopee to seller for additional services.


For cb sip affiliate shop: service_fee=service_fee_pri * exchange_rate


For tw shop, there will be pre-order service fee included

commission_fee_info_list.description:
This displays a breakdown of the Commission fees.


The commission fee charged by Shopee platform if applicable. 


For cb sip affiliate shop: commission_fee=commission_fee_pri * exchange_rate

seller_order_processing_fee.description: Order Processing Fee is the amount charged to sellers for every order created.

buyer_paid_packaging_fee.description: The fee charged to the buyer for packaging materials

trade_in_bonus_by_seller.description: The discount provided by Seller/ Retailers for buyers who opt for trade-in.

fbs_fee.description: Fulfilled by Shopee (FBS) Fee applied to this order, covering costs such as handling and storage and packaging. Only for PH Local Orders.

buyer_payment_info.description: The buyer payment info at order checkout moment. (snapshot value)

buyer_service_fee.description:
An additional service fee charged by shopee to Buyer at checkout. currently only applicable to ID region.
it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

buyer_tax_amount.description:
The tax amount paid by buyer.

currently this is a custom tax charged to CB orders in TW,CL,MX

buyer_total_amount.description: The total amount paid by buyer at checkout moment.

credit_card_promotion.description:
The promotion provided by credit card.
it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

icms_tax_amount.description:
The icms tax paid by buyer. this is only applicable to BR region
it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

import_tax_amount.description:
The import tax paid by buyer. 
it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

initial_buyer_txn_fee.description:
Transaction fee paid by buyer for the order. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. ). Most regions would have this fee charged to buyer at checkout depending on the fee rules applied in each region.
it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

insurance_premium.description: The insurance premium paid by buyer. Currently only applicable to some regions like PH, MY, ID, VN, SG and TH it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

iof_tax_amount.description:
The iof tax paid by buyer. 

it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

is_paid_by_credit_card.description:
Whether this order is paid by credit card. it's related to payment channel used at checkout.

Value: false,true

merchant_subtotal.description:
The total item price paid by buyer at checkout.

it is an initial value and will not be updated after RR/cancellation

seller_voucher.description:
The voucher provided by seller to offset some value needs to be paid by buyer.

it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

shipping_fee.description:
The shipping fee paid by buyer. (Only display for non cb sip affiliate shop. 

it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

shipping_fee_sst_amount.description:
The shipping fee sst paid by buyer. Currently apply to MY region only 

it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

shopee_voucher.description:
The voucher provided by Shopee to offset the amount need to be paid by buyer.

it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

shopee_coins_redeemed.description:
This is an amount of coin used by buyer at checkout to offset some amount to be paid. 

it is an initial value (will not be updated after RR/cancellation)

buyer_paid_packaging_fee.description: The fee charged to the buyer for packaging materials

trade_in_bonus.description: The total amount of all trade-in bonuses applied to a transaction. This value is the summation of the bonuses contributed by all four parties: Shopee, Seller, Bank and Trade-in Partner.

bulky_handling_fee.description: A fee charged to the buyer for the special handling and transportation required for items that exceed a specified weight or dimension threshold. Only for ID local seller

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

error.description: Error code

message.description: Error message

post.description:
Use this API to approve or reject a prescription

### Potential Errors
| Error Code | Description |
|---|---|
| order.prescription_order_status_invalid | Prescription order is already completed or canceled |
| error_param | There is no access_token in query. |
| error_param | Invalid partner_id. |
| error_param | There is no partner_id in query. |
| error_param | no timestamp |
| error_param | Invalid timestamp |
| error_data | parse data failed |
| error_data | data not exist |
| error_param | parameter invalid |
| logistics.error_pharmacistname_required | Pharmacist name is required. Please enter a valid name. |
| error_param | The information you queried is not found. |
| error_param | Wrong parameters, detail: {msg}. |
| error_server | Something wrong. Please try later.	 |
| error_shop | shopid is invalid |
| error_param | request not from gateway |

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

is_success.description: This is to indicate whether the request has been executed successfully.

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

order_sn.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

is_approved.description: Approve or reject the prescription. Available values: TRUE, FALSE.

reject_reason_code.description:
Reject reason code. Available values: 

1 = Invalid Prescription (counterfeit/incorrect format)

2 = Incorrect Dosage

3 = No Prescription

parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.description: The set of package_number. If there are multiple package_number, you need to use English comma to connect them. limit [1,50]

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

order_sn.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

package_number.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

fulfillment_status.description: The Shopee fulfillment status for the package. Applicable values: See V2.0 Data Definition - PackageFulfillmentStatus.

update_time.description: Timestamp that indicates the last time that there was a change in value of package.

shipping_carrier.description: The logistics service provider that the buyer selected for the package to deliver items. If logistics_channel_id is 90021 or 90026, service_code will be appended.

allow_self_design_awb.description: To indicate whether the package allows for self-designed AWB, if allow_self_design_awb returns false, it means that the package does not allow for self-designed AWB and only the system-AWB can be used.

days_to_ship.description: Shipping preparation time set by the seller when listing item on Shopee.

ship_by_date.description: The deadline to ship out the package.

pending_terms.description: The list of pending terms, possible values: SYSTEM_PENDING for order under Shopee internal processing, KYC_PENDING for order under KYC checking(TW CB order only)

tracking_number.description: The tracking number of this package.

is_split_up.description: To indicate whether this parcel is split.

model_id.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a model.

item_sku.description: A item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. Item SKU can be assigned to an item in Shopee Listings.

model_sku.description: ID of the model that belongs to the same item.

model_quantity.description: The number of identical items/variations purchased at the same time by the same buyer from one listing/item.

order_item_id.description: The identify of order item. For items in one same bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should share the same id, such as 1,2. For items not in bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should be the same as item_id.

consultation_id.description: An identifier of teleconsultation session which buyer did to order this item. Empty if item is not ordered through teleconsultation session

item_list.description: The lis of items in the package.

recipient_address.description:
This object contains detailed breakdown for the recipient address.
Different parameters might be masked according to each market and kind of seller.

For TW region integrated channel orders will be all masked as "****". More details may refer the announcement.

phone.description:
Recipient's phone number input when order was placed.

[Only for TW non-integrated channel] Will return "****" when the "virtual_contact_number" is available

town.description: The town of the recipient's address. Whether there is a town will depend on the region and/or country.

district.description: The district of the recipient's address. Whether there is a district will depend on the region and/or country.

city.description: The city of the recipient's address. Whether there is a city will depend on the region and/or country.

state.description: The state/province of the recipient's address. Whether there is a state/province will depend on the region and/or country.

region.description: The two-digit code representing the region of the Recipient.

full_address.description: The full address of the recipient, including country, state, even street, and etc.

parcel_chargeable_weight_gram.description: display weight used to calculate ASF for this parcel

group_shipment_id.description: The common identifier for multiple orders combined in the same parcel.

virtual_contact_number.description: [Only for TW non-integrated channel] The virtual phone number to contact the recipient.

package_query_number.description: [Only for TW non-integrated channel] The query number used in virtual phone number calls to contact the recipient of this package.

sorting_group.description: [Only for TW 30029 channel] This field indicate the sorting group value of the package. This field is only available for logistics_channel_id = 30029 and after the package has been arranged for shipment.

prescription_images.description:
Return prescription images of this order, only for ID and PH whitelist sellers.


Please add the prefix to review:

for ID: https://cf.shopee.co.id/file/+prescription_image

for PH: https://cf.shopee.ph/file/+prescription_image

pharmacist_name.description: Name of the Pharmacist for Prescription Order.

prescription_approval_time.description: Time of when the prescription is approved.

prescription_rejection_time.description: Time of when the prescription is rejected.

is_buyer_shop_collection.description: To indicate if this order is buyer self collection at store order.

buyer_proof_of_collection.description: The image url of the proof for buyer self collection at the store.

warning.description: Indicate warning message you should take care.

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

parameters.name: time_range_field
parameters.description: The kind of time_from and time_to. Available value: create_time, update_time.

parameters.name: time_from
parameters.description: The time_from and time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving bookings (based on the time_range_field). The time_from field is the starting date range. The maximum date range that may be specified with the time_from and time_to fields is 15 days.

parameters.name: time_to
parameters.description: The time_from and time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving bookings (based on the time_range_field). The time_from field is the starting date range. The maximum date range that may be specified with the time_from and time_to fields is 15 days.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data.The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is "". If data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

parameters.name: booking_status
parameters.description: The booking_status filter for retrieving bookings and each one only every request. Available value: READY_TO_SHIP/PROCESSED/SHIPPED/CANCELLED/MATCHED

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

more.description: This is to indicate whether the booking list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve bookings.

order_sn.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order. Only return if booking_status is MATCHED.

booking_status.description: The booking_status filter for retrieving booking and each one only every request. Available value: READY_TO_SHIP/PROCESSED/SHIPPED/CANCELLED/MATCHED

next_cursor.description: If more is true, you should pass the next_cursor in the next request as cursor. The value of next_cursor will be empty string when more is false.

parameters.description: The set of booking_sn. If there are multiple booking_sn, you need to use English comma to connect them. limit [1,50]

parameters.name: response_optional_fields
parameters.description: The response fields you want to get. Please select from the below response parameters. If you input an object field, all the params under it will be included automatically in the response. If there are multiple response fields you want to get, you need to use English comma to connect them. Available values: item_list,cancel_by,cancel_reason,fulfillment_flag,pickup_done_time,shipping_carrier, recipient_address, dropshipper, dropshipper_phone

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

booking_sn.description: Return by default. Shopee's unique identifier for a booking.

order_sn.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order. Only return if booking_status is MATCHED.

region.description: Return by default. The two-digit code representing the region where the booking was made.

booking_status.description: Return by default. Enumerated type that defines the current status of the booking. Available value: READY_TO_SHIP/PROCESSED/SHIPPED/CANCELLED/MATCHED

shipping_carrier.description: The logistics service provider that will deliver the booking.

create_time.description: Return by default. Timestamp that indicates the date and time that the booking was created.

update_time.description: Return by default. Timestamp that indicates the last time that there was a change in value of booking, such as booking status changed from 'Processed' to 'Shipped'.

ship_by_date.description: Return by default. The deadline to ship out the parcel.

recipient_address.description: This object contains detailed breakdown for the recipient address.

phone.description: Recipient's phone number input when booking was placed.

town.description: The town of the recipient's address. Whether there is a town will depend on the region and/or country.

district.description: The district of the recipient's address. Whether there is a district will depend on the region and/or country.

city.description: The city of the recipient's address. Whether there is a city will depend on the region and/or country.

state.description: The state/province of the recipient's address. Whether there is a state/province will depend on the region and/or country.

region.description: The two-digit code representing the region of the Recipient.

full_address.description: The full address of the recipient, including country, state, even street, and etc.

item_sku.description: A item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. Item SKU can be assigned to an item in Shopee Listings.

model_id.description: ID of the model that belongs to the same item.

model_name.description: Name of the model that belongs to the same item. A seller can offer models of the same item. For example, the seller could create a fixed-priced listing for a t-shirt design and offer the shirt in different colors and sizes. In this case, each color and size combination is a separate model. Each model can have a different quantity and price.

model_sku.description: A model SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller. It is only intended for the seller's use. Many sellers assign a SKU to an item of a specific type, size, and color, which are models of one item in Shopee Listings.

model_quantity_purchased.description: The number of identical items from one listing/item in the same booking.

weight.description: The weight of the item

product_location_id.description: The fulfilment warehouse ID(s) of the items in the booking. (Multi-Warehouse sellers only)

image_url.description: The image url of the product. Default to be variation image, if the model does not have a variation image, will use an item main image instead.

item_list.description: This object contains the detailed breakdown for the result of this API call.

dropshipper.description: For Indonesia bookings only. The name of the dropshipper.

dropshipper_phone.description: The phone number of dropshipper, could be empty.

cancel_by.description: Could be one of buyer, seller, system or Ops.

cancel_reason.description: Use this field to get reason for buyer, seller, and system cancellation.

fulfillment_flag.description: Use this field to indicate the booking is fulfilled by shopee or seller. Applicable values: fulfilled_by_shopee, fulfilled_by_cb_seller, fulfilled_by_local_seller.

warning.description: Indicate warning message you should take care.

The identify of product promotion.It's required for add on deal and bundle deal items.
For items in one same add on deal or bundle deal promotion, the promotion_group_id should share the same id. For items not in add on deal or bundle deal promotion, the promotion_group_id should be 0. And the data is from promotion_group_id of v2,order.get_order_detail.

model_quantity.description:
The number of identical items put in the package, the quantity sum of the same item from each parcel must be the full item quantity of the whole order.


This field is only eligible for the shop whitelisted to the unit-level split in SG/TH/TW/MY markets.

item_list.description: The list of items under the same package.

package_list.description:
The list of packages that you want to split. 


Note: 

- Orders that include installation services cannot be split by quantity.

- When splitting the order, must contain all items in the order in one request.

- You can split the order into 30 parcels at most in TW and 5 parcels at most in other regions.

| Error Code | Description |
|---|---|
| error_not_found | Wrong parameters, detail: {msg}. |
| error_param | Wrong parameters, detail: {msg}. |
| error_permission | Sorry you don't have the permission, detail: {msg}. |
| error_server | System error. Please try again later. |
| order.order_list_invalid_time | Start time must be earlier than end time and diff in 15days. |
| error_param | There is no access_token in query. |
| error_auth | Invalid access_token. |
| error_param | Invalid partner_id. |
| error_param | There is no partner_id in query. |
| error_auth | No permission to current api. |
| error_param | There is no sign in query. |
| error_sign | Wrong sign. |
| error_param | no timestamp |
| error_param | Invalid timestamp |
| error_network | Inner http call failed |
| error_data | parse data failed |
| error_data | data not exist |
| error_param | parameter invalid |
| error_param | The information you queried is not found. |

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

parameters.name: time_range_field
parameters.description: The kind of time_from and time_to. Available value: create_time, update_time.

parameters.name: time_from
parameters.description: The time_from and time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving orders (based on the time_range_field). The time_from field is the starting date range. The maximum date range that may be specified with the time_from and time_to fields is 15 days.

parameters.name: time_to
parameters.description: The time_from and time_to fields specify a date range for retrieving orders (based on the time_range_field). The time_from field is the starting date range. The maximum date range that may be specified with the time_from and time_to fields is 15 days.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data.The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100.

parameters.name: cursor
parameters.description: Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. The default is empty. If the data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start the next call.

parameters.name: order_status
parameters.description: The order_status filter for retriveing orders and each one only every request. Available value: UNPAID/READY_TO_SHIP/PROCESSED/SHIPPED/COMPLETED/IN_CANCEL/CANCELLED/INVOICE_PENDING

parameters.name: response_optional_fields
parameters.description: Optional fields in response. Available value: order_status.

parameters.name: request_order_status_pending
parameters.description: Compatible parameter during migration period, send True will let API support PENDING status, send False or don’t send will fallback to old logic.

parameters.name: logistics_channel_id
parameters.description: The identity of logistic channel. Valid only for BR.

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

more.description: This is to indicate whether the order list is more than one page. If this value is true, you may want to continue to check next page to retrieve orders.

order_sn.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

order_status.description: The order_status filter for retriveing orders and each one only every request. Available value: UNPAID/READY_TO_SHIP/PROCESSED/SHIPPED/COMPLETED/IN_CANCEL/CANCELLED

booking_sn.description:
Return by default. Shopee's unique identifier for a booking.

Only returned for advance fulfilment matched order only.

next_cursor.description: If  more is true, you should pass the next_cursor in the next request as cursor. The value of next_cursor will be empty string when more is false.

parameters.name: order_sn_list
parameters.description: The set of order_sn. If there are multiple order_sn, you need to use English comma to connect them. limit [1,50]

parameters.name: request_order_status_pending
parameters.description: Compatible parameter during migration period, send True will let API support PENDING status and return  pending_terms, send False or don’t send will fallback to old logic

parameters.name: response_optional_fields
parameters.description: a response fields you want to get. Please select from the below response parameters. If you input an object field, all the params under it will be included automatically in the response. If there are multiple response fields you want to get, you need to use English comma to connect them. Available values: buyer_user_id,buyer_username,estimated_shipping_fee,recipient_address,actual_shipping_fee ,goods_to_declare,note,note_update_time,item_list,pay_time,dropshipper, dropshipper_phone,split_up,buyer_cancel_reason,cancel_by,cancel_reason,actual_shipping_fee_confirmed,buyer_cpf_id,fulfillment_flag,pickup_done_time,package_list,shipping_carrier,payment_method,total_amount,buyer_username,invoice_data,order_chargeable_weight_gram,return_request_due_date,edt,payment_info

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

message.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

order_sn.description: Return by default. Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

region.description: Return by default. The two-digit code representing the region where the order was made.

currency.description: Return by default. The three-digit code representing the currency unit for which the order was paid.

cod.description: Return by default. This value indicates whether the order was a COD (cash on delivery) order.

total_amount.description: The total amount paid by the buyer for the order. This amount includes the total sale price of items, shipping cost beared by buyer; and offset by Shopee promotions if applicable. This value will only return after the buyer has completed payment for the order.

pending_terms.description: The list of pending terms, possible values: SYSTEM_PENDING for order under Shopee internal processing, KYC_PENDING for order under KYC checking(TW CB order only)

order_status.description: Return by default. Enumerated type that defines the current status of the order.

shipping_carrier.description: The logistics service provider that the buyer selected for the order to deliver items. If logistics_channel_id is 90021 or 90026, service_code will be appended.

payment_method.description: The payment method that the buyer selected to pay for the order. Applicable values: See Data Definition- Payment Methods.

estimated_shipping_fee.description: The estimated shipping fee is an estimation calculated by Shopee based on specific logistics courier's standard.

message_to_seller.description: Return by default. Message to seller.

create_time.description: Return by default. Timestamp that indicates the date and time that the order was created.

update_time.description: Return by default. Timestamp that indicates the last time that there was a change in value of order, such as order status changed from 'Paid' to 'Completed'.

days_to_ship.description: Return by default. Shipping preparation time set by the seller when listing item on Shopee.

ship_by_date.description: Return by default. The deadline to ship out the parcel.

buyer_user_id.description: The user id of buyer of this order, will be empty if it is a non-integrated order in TW region.

buyer_username.description: The name of buyer, will be masked as "****" if it is a non-integrated order in TW region.

recipient_address.description:
This object contains detailed breakdown for the recipient address.
Different parameters might be masked according to each market and kind of seller.

For TW region integrated channel orders will be all masked as "****". More details may refer the announcement.

phone.description:
Recipient's phone number input when order was placed.
[Only for TW non-integrated channel] Will return "****" when the "virtual_contact_number" is available

town.description: The town of the recipient's address. Whether there is a town will depend on the region and/or country.

district.description: The district of the recipient's address. Whether there is a district will depend on the region and/or country.

city.description: The city of the recipient's address. Whether there is a city will depend on the region and/or country.

state.description: The state/province of the recipient's address. Whether there is a state/province will depend on the region and/or country.

region.description: The two-digit code representing the region of the Recipient.

full_address.description: The full address of the recipient, including country, state, even street, and etc.

actual_shipping_fee.description: The actual shipping fee of the order if available from external logistics partners.

goods_to_declare.description: Only work for cross-border order.This value indicates whether the order contains goods that are required to declare at customs. "T" means true and it will mark as "T" on the shipping label; "F" means false and it will mark as "P" on the shipping label. This value is accurate ONLY AFTER the order trackingNo is generated, please capture this value AFTER your retrieve the trackingNo.

note.description: The note seller made for own reference.

item_id.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

item_sku.description: A item SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller, sometimes called parent SKU. Item SKU can be assigned to an item in Shopee Listings.

model_id.description: ID of the model that belongs to the same item.

model_name.description: Name of the model that belongs to the same item. A seller can offer models of the same item. For example, the seller could create a fixed-priced listing for a t-shirt design and offer the shirt in different colors and sizes. In this case, each color and size combination is a separate model. Each model can have a different quantity and price.

model_sku.description: A model SKU (stock keeping unit) is an identifier defined by a seller. It is only intended for the seller's use. Many sellers assign a SKU to an item of a specific type, size, and color, which are models of one item in Shopee Listings.

model_quantity_purchased.description: The number of identical items purchased at the same time by the same buyer from one listing/item.

model_original_price.description: The original price of the item in the listing currency.

model_discounted_price.description: The after-discount price of the item in the listing currency. If there is no discount, this value will be same as that of model_original_price. In case of bundle deal item, this value will return 0 as by design bundle deal discount will not be breakdown to item/model level. Due to technical restriction, the value will return the price before bundle deal if we don't configure it to 0. Please call GetEscrowDetails if you want to calculate item-level discounted price for bundle deal item.

wholesale.description: This value indicates whether buyer buy the order item in wholesale price.

weight.description: The weight of the item

add_on_deal.description: To indicate if this item belongs to an addon deal.

main_item.description: To indicate if this item is main item or sub item. True means main item, false means sub item.

add_on_deal_id.description: A unique ID to distinguish groups of items in Cart, and Order. (e.g. AddOnDeal)

promotion_type.description:
Available type：product_promotion, flash_sale, bundle_deal, add_on_deal_main, add_on_deal_sub.


For items which attend multiple promotions will only show one promotion, the order of priority is: 

bundle_deal > add_on_deal_main > add_on_deal_sub > product_promotion >flash_sale

image_url.description: The image url of the product. Default to be variation image, if the model does not have a variation image, will use an item main image instead.

product_location_id.description: The fulfilment warehouse ID(s) of the items in the order. (Multi-Warehouse sellers only)

is_prescription_item.description: To indicate if this item is prescription item

is_b2c_owned_item.description:
determine if item is B2C_shop_item

It should be `is_b2c_shop_item` but it was a bug from dev. Then now it's is_b2c_owned_item

consultation_id.description: An identifier of teleconsultation session which buyer did to order this item. Empty if item is not ordered through teleconsultation session

promotion_type.description:
Indicates the type of item or package level promotion applied to a product. Each item can be associated with at most one item promotion and one package promotion at a time.

Item Promotions:

low_price_promotion

deep_discount

platform_sale

seller_discount

flash_sale

wholesale

welcome_package_free_gift

brand_flash_sale

in_shop_flash_sale

synced_promo

platform_streaming_price

seller_streaming_price

exclusive_streamer_price

price_bidding_with_rebate

price_bidding_without_rebate

seller_advisor_price

selling_price

settlement_price

campaign_settlement_price

local_sip_settlement_price

platform_exclusive_price

seller_exclusive_price

seller_member_exclusive_sku

item_price

order_sync_price


Package Promotions:
bundle_deal
add_on_deal_main
add_on_deal_sub

promotion_id.description: Represents the unique identifier of a specific promotion applied to an item. Each promotion_id corresponds to a distinct promotion rule or campaign, defined under a particular promotion_type. The value is expressed in a numeric string format.

hot_listing_item.description: [Only for PH,TH,VN,MY,BR,TW] True if the item is hot listing.

item_list.description: This object contains the detailed breakdown for the result of this API call.

pay_time.description: The time when the order status is updated from UNPAID to PAID. This value is NULL when order is not paid yet.

dropshipper.description: For Indonesia orders only. The name of the dropshipper.

dropshipper_phone.description: The phone number of dropshipper, could be empty.

split_up.description: To indicate whether this order is split to fullfil order(forder) level. Call GetForderInfo if it's "true".

buyer_cancel_reason.description: Cancel reason from buyer, could be empty.

cancel_by.description: Could be one of buyer, seller, system or Ops.

cancel_reason.description: Use this field to get reason for buyer, seller, and system cancellation.

actual_shipping_fee_confirmed.description: Use this filed to judge whether the actual_shipping_fee is confirmed.

buyer_cpf_id.description: Buyer's CPF number for taxation and invoice purposes. Only for Brazil order.

fulfillment_flag.description: Use this field to indicate the order is fulfilled by shopee or seller. Applicable values: fulfilled_by_shopee, fulfilled_by_cb_seller, fulfilled_by_local_seller.

pickup_done_time.description: The timestamp when pickup is done.

package_number.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order.

logistics_status.description: The Shopee logistics status for the order. Applicable values: See Data Definition-LogisticsStatus.

shipping_carrier.description: The logistics service provider that the buyer selected for the order to deliver items. If logistics_channel_id is 90021 or 90026, service_code will be appended.

allow_self_design_awb.description: To indicate whether the package allows for self-designed AWB, if allow_self_design_awb returns false, it means that the package does not allow for self-designed AWB and only the system-AWB can be used.

item_id.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an item.

model_id.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a model.

model_quantity.description: The number of identical items/variations purchased at the same time by the same buyer from one listing/item.

order_item_id.description: The identify of order item. For items in one same bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should share the same id, such as 1,2. For items not in bundle deal promotion, the order_item_id should be the same as item_id.

item_list.description: The lis of items.

parcel_chargeable_weight.description: display weight used to calculate ASF for this parcel

group_shipment_id.description: The common identifier for multiple orders combined in the same parcel.

virtual_contact_number.description: [Only for TW non-integrated channel] The virtual phone number to contact the recipient.

package_query_number.description: [Only for TW non-integrated channel] The query number used in virtual phone number calls to contact the recipient of this package.

sorting_group.description: [Only for TW 30029 channel] This field indicate the sorting group value of the package. This field is only available for logistics_channel_id = 30029 and after the package has been arranged for shipment.

package_list.description: The list of package under an order

invoice_data.description: The invoice data of the order.

series_number.description: The series number of the invoice.

access_key.description: The access key of the invoice.

issue_date.description: The issue date of the invoice.

total_value.description: The total value of the invoice.

products_total_value.description: The products total value of the invoice.

tax_code.description: The tax code for the invoice.

checkout_shipping_carrier.description: For non masking order, the logistics service provider that the buyer selected for the order to deliver items.  For masking order, the logistics service type that the buyer selected for the order to deliver items.

reverse_shipping_fee.description: Shopee charges the reverse shipping fee for the returned order.The value of this field will be non-negative.

order_chargeable_weight_gram.description: display weight used to calculate ASF for this order

prescription_images.description:
Return prescription images of this order, only for ID and PH whitelist sellers.


Please add the prefix to review:

for ID: https://cf.shopee.co.id/file/+prescription_image

for PH:https://cf.shopee.ph/file/+prescription_image

prescription_check_status.description: enum OrderPrescriptionCheckStatus: NONE = 0; PASSED = 1; FAILED = 2; Only for ID and PH whitelist sellers.

pharmacist_name.description: Name of the Pharmacist for Prescription Order.

prescription_approval_time.description: Time of when the prescription is approved.

prescription_rejection_time.description: Time of when the prescription is rejected.

edt_from.description: Earliest estimated delivery date of orders (only available for BR region)

edt_to.description: Latest estimated delivery time of orders (only available for BR region)

booking_sn.description:
Return by default. Shopee's unique identifier for a booking.

Only returned for advance fulfilment matched order only.

advance_package.description: Indicate whether order will be fulfilled using advance fulfilment stock or not. If value is true, order will be matched with a booking and seller should not arrange shipment.

return_request_due_date.description:
This field represents the deadline for buyers to initiate returns and refunds after order is completed.


The “return_request_due_date” response parameter will be returned if the requested order meets ALL the conditions below:

- The status of the order is COMPLETED

- The return refund eligibility of the order is true


If you have any questions related to the function of "returns and refunds after order is completed," please refer to the following link: https://seller.shopee.tw/edu/article/18474

payment_method.description: [Only for BR] Payment method used in the order, such as Credit Card, Debit Card, Pix, etc.

payment_processor_register.description: [Only for BR] CNPJ of the payment processor handling the transaction.

card_brand.description: [Only for BR] Card brand for credit or debit transactions, such as VISA, MASTER, etc. Empty string for Pix payments.

transaction_id.description: [Only for BR] Payment authorization code generated by the bank or payment processor to validate the transaction.

payment_amount.description: [Only for BR] Amount paid by the corresponding payment method.

payment_info.description: [Only for BR] List of payment information, to follow NT 2025.001 (BR government invoice rules).

is_buyer_shop_collection.description: To indicate if this order is buyer self collection at store order

buyer_proof_of_collection.description: The image url of the buyer self collection at the store.

hot_listing_order.description: [Only for PH,TH,VN,MY,BR,TW] True if the order includes hot listing item.

warning.description: Indicate warning message you should take care.

post.description:
Use this ai to undo split of order. After undo split, the order will have only one package. It can only be used when order status still at READY_TO_SHIP.

post.description:
Use this API to search the list of packages that have not been SHIPPED to proceed arranging shipment, and it supports various filters and sort fields.

### Potential Errors
| Error Code | Description |
|---|---|
| error_data | parse data failed |
| error_data | data not exist |
| error_param | parameter invalid |
| error_param | The information you queried is not found. |
| error_param | Wrong parameters, detail: {msg}. |
| error_server | Something wrong. Please try later.	 |
| error_shop | shopid is invalid |
| error_param | request not from gateway |

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

error.description: Indicate error type if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

mesage.description: Indicate error details if hit error. Empty if no error happened.

order_sn.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

package_number.description: Shopee's unique identifier for the package under an order

product_location_id.description: Just use this field to pass the next step of Mass ArrangeShipment

sorting_group.description: [Only for TW 30029 channel] This field indicate the sorting group value of the package. This field is only available for logistics_channel_id = 30029 and after the package has been arranged for shipment.

total_count.description: Total orders can be returned with your query

next_cursor.description: if packages is not empty or length of packages <= page_size. You should pass the next_cursor in the next request as page_sentinel.

more.description: To indicate, it's a the last page or not

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking.

package_status.description:
Use this field to filter the packages of specific status. Applicable values:

0: All

1: Pending

2: ToProcess

3: Processed


Default value = 2 (ToProcess)

product_location_ids.description: List of product_location_id. Use this field to filter the packages under specific warehouses.

logistics_channel_ids.description: List of logistics_channel_id. Use this field to filter the packages under specific logistics channels.

fulfillment_type.description:
Use this field to filter the packages fulfilled by shopee or seller. Applicable values: 

0: None (not apply filter)

1: Shopee

2: Seller


Default value = 2 (Seller)

invoice_pending.description:
Use this field to filter the packages under invoice_pending.


Default value = false

sorting_group.description:
[Only for TW 30029 channel] Use this field to filter the sorting group of parcel. This field is only available for package with package_status = 3 and logistics_channel_id = 30029. Applicable values: 
0: All

1: North
2: South

page_size.description: Each result set is returned as a page of entries. Use the "page_size" filters to control the maximum number of entries to retrieve per page (i.e., per call). This integer value is used to specify the maximum number of entries to return in a single "page" of data.The limit of page_size if between 1 and 100.

cursor.description: Specifies the starting entry of data to return in the current call. Default is "". If data is more than one page, the offset can be some entry to start next call.

sort_type.description:
Use this field to specify which field to use to sort the returned package list. Available values: 

1: ShipByDate  

2: CreateDate

3: ConfirmedDate


Default value = 1 (ShipByDate)

ascending.description:
Use this field to specify whether the returned package list is sorted in ascending or descending sort_type.


Default value = true

post.description:
This API creates a task to download a specific tax document (e.g., sales invoice, remessa invoice) for the seller's account, available only after the document is issued by the system as part of the Fulfilled by Shopee (FBS) process.
The workflow is as follows: (1) v2.order.generate_fbs_invoices; (2) v2.order.get_fbs_invoices_result; (3) v2.order.download_fbs_invoices.
Please note: The download link for the document will expire 30 minutes after being generated.

### Potential Errors
| Error Code | Description |
|---|---|
| error_data | parse data failed |
| error_data | data not exist |
| error_param | parameter invalid |
| error_param | The information you queried is not found. |
| error_param | Wrong parameters, detail: {msg}. |
| error_server | Something wrong. Please try later.	 |
| error_shop | shopid is invalid |
| error_param | request not from gateway |

post.description:
This API allows you to download FBS invoices. To use this API, the client must first call v2.order.generate_fbs_invoices to create a new shipping document task, followed by calling v2.order.get_fbs_invoices_result to check the task status. The document can only be downloaded once the task status is "READY."

- PH: Postal code

full_address.description:

parameters.name: partner_id
parameters.description: Partner ID is assigned upon registration is successful. Required for all requests.

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: This is to indicate the timestamp of the request. Required for all requests. Expires in 5 minutes.

parameters.name: access_token
parameters.description: The token for API access, using to identify your permission to the api. Valid for multiple use and expires in 4 hours.

parameters.name: shop_id
parameters.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a shop. Required param for most APIs.

parameters.name: return_sn
parameters.description: The serial number of return.

request_id.description: The identifier for an API request for error tracking

error.description: error code

message.description: error description

reason.description: Reason for return product. Applicable values: See Data Definition- ReturnReason.

update_time.description: The time of modify return.

status.description: Enumerated type that defines the current status of the return. Applicable values: See Data Definition- ReturnStatus.

due_date.description: The last time seller deal with this return.

tracking_number.description: The tracking number assigned by the shipping carrier for item shipment.

dispute_reason.description: The reason of seller dispute return. While the return has been disputed, this field is useful. Applicable values: See Data Definition- ReturnDisputeReason.

dispute_text_reason.description: The reason that seller provide. While the return has been disputed, this field is useful.

needs_logistics.description: Items to be sent back to seller. Can be either integrated/non-integrated.

username.description: Buyer's nickname, will be masked as "****" if it is a non-integrated return in TW region.

email.description: Buyer's email, will be empty if it is a non-integrated return in TW region.

portrait.description: Buyer's portrait, will be empty if it is a non-integrated return in TW region.

model_id.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a variation of an item.

name.description: Name of item in local language.

is_add_on_deal.description: To indicate if this item belongs to an addon deal.

is_main_item.description: To indicate if this item is main item or sub item. True means main item, false means sub item.

add_on_deal_id.description: The unique identity of an addon deal.

refund_amount.description:
item's refund amount. only for shops whitelisted for Partial Qty RR.

If not available, refer to item_price

order_sn.description: Shopee's unique identifier for an order.

return_ship_due_date.description: The due date for buyer to ship order.

return_seller_due_date.description: The due date for seller to deal with this return when buyer have shipped order.

variation_id.description: Shopee's unique identifier for a variation of an item.

refund_amount.description: item's refund amount for bundle deal cases, only for shops whitelisted for Partial Qty RR.

seller_proof_status.description: To indicate whether the seller needs to provide evidence when the return status is RETURN_JUDING, RETURN_SELLER_DISPUTE and RETURN_ACCEPTED. Applicable values: See Data Definition- SellerProofStatus.

seller_evidence_deadline.description: To indicate the deadline for submitting the evidence.

seller_compensation_status.description: To indicate whether the seller is eligible for raising a compensation request. See "Data Definition - SellerCompensationStatus"

seller_compensation_due_date.description: To indicate the deadline for requesting the compensation

compensation_amount.description: To indicate the compensation amount that the agent decided

negotiation_status.description: To indicate whether the seller can negotiate with the buyer. See "Data Definition - NegotiationStatus"

latest_solution.description: To indicate what is the offer solution. See "Data Definition - ReturnSolution"

latest_offer_amount.description: To indicate the refund amount in the latest offer solution

latest_offer_creator.description: To indicate which party made the latest offer

counter_limit.description: To indicate the remaining counter limit

logistics_status.description:
To indicate the reverse logistics status. See "Data Definition - LogisticsStatus".


Note: 

- This is a legacy field that only reflects the reverse logistics status of Normal RR. To determine whether the RR is a Normal RR, check if return_refund_request_type = 0.

- If you need the reverse logistics status for Normal RR, In-transit RR, or Return-on-the-Spot, please use the newly released field reverse_logistic_status instead.

reverse_logistic_status.description:
To indicate the latest reverse logistic status of a return, referring to the current status of the buyer shipping the return parcel back to the validation point (seller or warehouse), including Normal RR, In-transit RR, and Return-on-the-Spot.


See "Data Definition - ReverseLogisticsStatus" as status displayed for Normal RR and In-transit RR or Return-on-the-Spot are different.

return_pickup_address.description: To indicate the buyer's pickup address

phone.description:
To indicate receiver's phone
[Only for TW non-integrated channel] Will return "****" when the "virtual_contact_number" is available

virtual_contact_number.description: [Only for TW non-integrated channel] The virtual phone number to contact the recipient.

package_query_number.description: [Only for TW non-integrated channel] The query number used in virtual phone number calls to contact the recipient of this return.

whs_id.description:
To indicate the warehouse id where item will be returned to. 

Please call v2.shop.get_warehouse_detail to check the detailed warehouse information the item returned to with the field "location_id" of the v2.shop.get_warehouse_detail match to the field"whs_id"of the v2.return.get_return_detail.


For fulfillment by Shopee (FBS) & multi warehouse sellers, R/R orders will be returned back to the nearest warehouse of buyer address instead of going back to only 1 default return address like a normal seller.If it's a normal seller, then the field will be response empty.

return_refund_type.description: To indicate whether the return is RRBOC (Return/Refund request raised before Order Complete) or RRAOC (Return/Refund request raised after Order Complete).

return_solution.description:
To indicate the most updated solution of the Return/Refund request (NOTE: this is not the solution during negotiation). Applicable value: 

- 0: Return and Refund

- 1: Refund Only

is_seller_arrange.description: To indicate whether the return_sn is using the “Seller Arrange” return method. This would only be True for TW and BR.

is_shipping_proof_mandatory.description: To indicate whether uploading shipping proof is mandatory for seller to confirm "Arrange Pickup" when is_seller_arrange = true.

has_uploaded_shipping_proof.description: To indicate whether seller has already uploaded shipping proof for this return.

is_reverse_logistics_channel_integrated.description: To indicate whether the reverse logistic channel type selected is integrated or non-integrated.

return_refund_request_type.description:
To indicate the type of return refund request, whether it is a Normal RR request, an In-transit RR request, and a Return on the Spot: 

0: Normal RR (RR is raised by the buyer after delivery done / estimated delivery date)

1: In-transit RR (RR is raised by the buyer while item is still in-transit to buyer)

2: Return-on-the-Spot (RR is raised by the driver after buyer rejected parcel at delivery)


For more details, see Data Definition- Return Refund Request Type.

validation_type.description:
To indicate whether seller or warehouse will expect to receive the return parcel from buyer and validate the condition of the parcel: 

- seller_validation 

- warehouse_validation


For more details, see Data Definition- ValidationType.

is_arrived_at_warehouse.description:
[Only for validation_type = warehouse_validation] Indicates the parcel’s check-in status at the warehouse. This field helps sellers quickly determine whether the parcel has arrived at the warehouse or has been rejected. 


Applicable values:

1: Pending Inbound

2: Rejected

3: Inbound

4: Cancelled

model_id.description: Unique identifier of the model under the item.

qty.description: Quantity of items or models under the same current status.

current_status.description:
Current status for the item/model within the warehouse.


Applicable values:

1：Dispose

2：Return to Seller

7：Received and Putaway

8：Return to Buyer

9：Shortage


Note: Since Resell is currently applicable only to Failed Delivery parcels, the following values will not be returned for now, and will be returned once Resell becomes applicable to Return Refund parcels in the future:

3：Putaway for Resell

4：Resell Outbound

5：Resell Failed

6：Resell Exit

related_order_sn_list.description:
List of order_sn generated from the Resell process. Returned only when current_status = 4 (Resell Outbound).


Note: Since Resell is currently applicable only to Failed Delivery parcels, this field will remain empty for now, and valid values will be returned once Resell becomes applicable to Return Refund parcels in the future.

resell_failed_next_step.description:
Next step after a Resell failure. Returned only when current_status = 5 (Resell Failed).


Note: Since Resell is currently applicable only to Failed Delivery parcels, this field will remain empty for now, and valid values will be returned once Resell becomes applicable to Return Refund parcels in the future.

follow_up_action_list.description: [Only for validation_type = warehouse_validation] Warehouse handling actions for each item in the parcel.

get.description:
Use this API to get the list of shipping carriers and request parameters needed before calling v2.returns.upload_shipping_proof. Only for TW and BR returns with is_seller_arrange = true.

|---|---|
| returns.missing_reverse_logistics_carrier_list | No reverse logistics carrier list available |
| returns.return_not_found | Return not found |
| returns.missing_return_sn | Return SN is a required parameter |
